PL_actualize = {
	effect  = {
		currency_law_list = yes
		test_1_c_global_stokpile_variable_list = yes
		test_2_c_global_stokpile_variable_list = yes
		test_3_c_global_stokpile_variable_list = yes
		test_4_c_global_stokpile_variable_list = yes
		test_5_c_global_stokpile_variable_list = yes


		global_monetary_reference_flux = yes

		national_capacity_variable_list = yes












	}
}

# ██████╗ ██╗██╗   ██╗███████╗██████╗ ███████╗
# ██╔══██╗██║██║   ██║██╔════╝██╔══██╗██╔════╝
# ██║  ██║██║██║   ██║█████╗  ██████╔╝███████╗
# ██║  ██║██║╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══╝  ██╔══██╗╚════██║
# ██████╔╝██║ ╚████╔╝ ███████╗██║  ██║███████║
# ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝  ╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝

is_ai = {
	is_shown = {
		is_ai = yes
	}
}
is_ai_v = {
	is_valid = {
		is_ai = yes
	}
}
not_is_ai = {
	is_shown = {
		is_ai = no
	}
}


seller_country_general_XY_oclick = {
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = seller_country_general
			value = 10
		}
	}
}
buyer_country_general_XY_oclick = {
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = seller_country_general
			value = 5
		}
	}
}

transfert_loot_state = {
	is_shown = {
		or = {
			and = {
				owner = player
				#var:financial_center_site_var = 1
				or = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_place
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					has_modifier = national_stockpile_place
					has_modifier = national_stockpile_historic_place
				}
				is_capital = no
			}
			and = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				owner = {
					is_at_war = yes
					has_war_with = player
				}
				controller = player
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = looted_state
		}
	}
}
is_looted_state = {
	is_shown = {
		has_modifier = looted_state
	}
}
stockpiling_central_bank_metal_reserves_state_transfert_state = {
	is_valid = {
		not = {
			has_modifier = looted_state
		}
	}
}
stockpiling_central_bank_metal_reserves_state_transfert = {
	effect = {
		stockpiling_capital_state_transfert = yes
	}
}
looting_state_button = { #enemy_capital_is_occuped_gui
	is_valid = {
		save_scope_as = occupied_capital
		owner = {
			is_at_war = yes
			has_war_with = player
		}
		player = {
			is_at_war = yes
			var:looting_1_year = 0
		}
		not  = {
			controller = owner #root
		}
	}
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_player = yes
				}
				set_variable  = {
					name = looting_1_year
					value = 1
				}
				every_scope_state = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_capital
				}
			}
		}
		save_scope_as = occupied_capital
		enemy_capital_is_occuped = yes
	}
}

################################################################################################################################################################
################################################################################################################################################################
################################################################################################################################################################

A_selection = {
    effect = {
		remove_variable = B_selection
		remove_variable = C_selection
		remove_variable = D_selection
		set_variable = A_selection
    }
}
B_selection = {
    effect = {
		remove_variable = A_selection
		remove_variable = C_selection
		remove_variable = D_selection
		set_variable = B_selection
    }
}
C_selection = {
    effect = {
		remove_variable = A_selection
		remove_variable = B_selection
		remove_variable = D_selection
		set_variable = C_selection
    }
}
D_selection = {
    effect = {
		remove_variable = A_selection
		remove_variable = B_selection
		remove_variable = C_selection
		set_variable = D_selection
    }
}

############################################################################################################################################################

modifier_currency_value = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_reference_currency = yes

			}
			add_modifier = {
				name = reference_currency
				multiplier = difference_with_average_gold_exchange_rate_currencies_revers_100
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_reference_currency_no = yes

			}
			add_modifier = {
				name = reference_currency_no
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_strong_currency = yes

			}
			add_modifier = {
				name = strong_currency
				multiplier = difference_with_average_gold_exchange_rate_currencies_revers_100
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_balanced_currency = yes

			}
			add_modifier = {
				name = balanced_currency
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_weak_currency = yes

			}
			add_modifier = {
				name = weak_currency
				multiplier = difference_with_average_gold_exchange_rate_currencies_revers_100
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_extreme_weak_currency = yes

			}
			add_modifier = {
				name = extreme_weak_currency
				multiplier = difference_with_average_gold_exchange_rate_currencies_revers_100
			}
		}
	}
}
modifier_inflation = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				inflation_value > 0.02
			}
			add_modifier = {
				name = inflation_country
				multiplier = inflation_value
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				inflation_value < -0.02
			}
			add_modifier = {
				name = deflation_country
				multiplier = inflation_value
			}
		}
	}
}

############################################################################################################################################################
############################################################################################################################################################
############################################################################################################################################################
############################################################################################################################################################

# ███╗   ███╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗███████╗████████╗ █████╗ ██████╗ ██╗   ██╗    ███████╗██╗   ██╗███████╗████████╗███████╗███╗   ███╗
# ████╗ ████║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝██╔══██╗██╔══██╗╚██╗ ██╔╝    ██╔════╝╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝██╔════╝████╗ ████║
# ██╔████╔██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║█████╗     ██║   ███████║██████╔╝ ╚████╔╝     ███████╗ ╚████╔╝ ███████╗   ██║   █████╗  ██╔████╔██║
# ██║╚██╔╝██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║██╔══╝     ██║   ██╔══██║██╔══██╗  ╚██╔╝      ╚════██║  ╚██╔╝  ╚════██║   ██║   ██╔══╝  ██║╚██╔╝██║
# ██║ ╚═╝ ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║███████╗   ██║   ██║  ██║██║  ██║   ██║       ███████║   ██║   ███████║   ██║   ███████╗██║ ╚═╝ ██║
# ╚═╝     ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝       ╚══════╝   ╚═╝   ╚══════╝   ╚═╝   ╚══════╝╚═╝     ╚═╝
#
# ███████╗███████╗██╗     ███████╗ ██████╗████████╗████████╗██╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗
# ██╔════╝██╔════╝██║     ██╔════╝██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝╚══██╔══╝██║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║
# ███████╗█████╗  ██║     █████╗  ██║        ██║      ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║
# ╚════██║██╔══╝  ██║     ██╔══╝  ██║        ██║      ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║
# ███████║███████╗███████╗███████╗╚██████╗   ██║      ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║
# ╚══════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝   ╚═╝      ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝

silver_standard_law = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	is_valid = {
		# var:revaluation_on = 0
		# var:devaluation_on = 0
		# has_technology_researched = central_banking
		# has_modifier = has_central_bank
		has_technology_researched = metalique_standart
		NOT = {
			has_law = law_type:law_silver_standard
			is_not_market_owner = yes
			has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
		}
	}
	effect = {
		activate_law = law_type:law_silver_standard
		central_bank_production_methods = yes
		remove_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		add_modifier = {
			name = foreign_exchange_controls
			months = 12
		}
	}
}
bimetallism_standard_law = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	is_valid = {
		# var:revaluation_on = 0
		# var:devaluation_on = 0
		# has_technology_researched = central_banking
		# has_modifier = has_central_bank
		has_technology_researched = metalique_standart
		NOT = {
			has_law = law_type:law_bimetallism_standard
			is_not_market_owner = yes
			has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
		}
	}
	effect = {
		activate_law = law_type:law_bimetallism_standard
		central_bank_production_methods = yes
		remove_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		add_modifier = {
			name = foreign_exchange_controls
			months = 12
		}
	}
}
fiat_standard_law = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	is_valid = {
		# var:revaluation_on = 0
		# var:devaluation_on = 0
		# has_technology_researched = central_banking
		# has_modifier = has_central_bank
		has_technology_researched = currency_standards
		NOT = {
			has_law = law_type:law_fiat_standard
			is_not_market_owner = yes
			has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
		}
	}
	effect = {
		activate_law = law_type:law_fiat_standard
		central_bank_production_methods = yes
		remove_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		add_modifier = {
			name = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
gold_standard_standard_law = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	is_valid = {
		# var:revaluation_on = 0
		# var:devaluation_on = 0
		# has_technology_researched = central_banking
		# has_modifier = has_central_bank
		has_technology_researched = metalique_standart
		NOT = {
			has_law = law_type:law_gold_standard
			is_not_market_owner = yes
			has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
		}
	}
	effect = {
		activate_law = law_type:law_gold_standard
		central_bank_production_methods = yes
		remove_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		add_modifier = {
			name = foreign_exchange_controls
			months = 12
		}
	}
}
gold_exchange_standard_standard_law = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	is_valid = {
		# var:revaluation_on = 0
		# var:devaluation_on = 0
		# has_modifier = has_central_bank

		has_technology_researched = gold_exchange_standard
		NOT = {
			has_law = law_type:law_gold_exchange_standard
			is_not_market_owner = yes
			has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
		}
	}
	effect = {
		activate_law = law_type:law_gold_exchange_standard
		central_bank_production_methods = yes
		central_bank_production_methods_3 = yes
		remove_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		add_modifier = {
			name = foreign_exchange_controls
			months = 12
		}
	}
}

############################################################################################################################################################
############################################################################################################################################################
############################################################################################################################################################
############################################################################################################################################################

# ██████╗ ███████╗██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ██╗     ██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ████████╗██╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗    ██╗██████╗ ███████╗██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ██╗     ██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ████████╗██╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗
# ██╔══██╗██╔════╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗╚══██╔══╝██║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║   ██╔╝██╔══██╗██╔════╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗╚══██╔══╝██║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║
# ██║  ██║█████╗  ██║   ██║███████║██║     ██║   ██║███████║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║  ██╔╝ ██████╔╝█████╗  ██║   ██║███████║██║     ██║   ██║███████║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║
# ██║  ██║██╔══╝  ╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║ ██╔╝  ██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║
# ██████╔╝███████╗ ╚████╔╝ ██║  ██║███████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║   ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║██╔╝   ██║  ██║███████╗ ╚████╔╝ ██║  ██║███████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║   ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║
# ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝  ╚═══╝  ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚═╝    ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝  ╚═══╝  ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝

no_monetary_policy_0 = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	is_valid = {
		var:revaluation_on = 0
		var:devaluation_on = 0
	}
	effect = {
		activate_law = law_type:law_no_monetary_policy
		random_scope_building = {
			limit = {
				is_building_group = bg_bank
			}
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_25
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_50
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_75
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_100
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_25
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_50
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_75
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_100
		}
	}
}

################################

################################

devaluation_currency_25 = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	is_valid = {
		var:revaluation_on = 0
		var:devaluation_on = 0
		has_technology_researched = central_banking
		has_modifier = has_central_bank
		# NOT = {
		# 	is_subject = yes
		#
		# 	is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
		# }
	}
	effect = {
		activate_law = law_type:law_devaluation_25
		random_scope_building = {
			limit = {
				is_building_group = bg_bank
				not = {
					has_modifier = devaluation_currency_25
				}
			}
			add_modifier = {
				name = devaluation_currency_25
			}
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_50
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_75
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_100
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_25
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_50
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_75
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_100
		}
	}
}
devaluation_currency_50 = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	is_valid = {
		var:revaluation_on = 0
		var:devaluation_on = 0
		has_technology_researched = central_banking
		has_modifier = has_central_bank
		currency_market_goods_lake_ratio > 0.5
		NOT = {
			OR = {
				has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_25
				has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_50
				has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_75

				has_law = law_type:law_revaluation_25
				has_law = law_type:law_revaluation_50
				has_law = law_type:law_revaluation_75
			}
		}
	}
	effect = {
		activate_law = law_type:law_devaluation_50
		random_scope_building = {
			limit = {
				is_building_group = bg_bank
				not = {
					has_modifier = devaluation_currency_50
				}
			}
			add_modifier = {
				name = devaluation_currency_50
			}
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_25
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_75
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_100
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_25
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_50
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_75
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_100
		}
	}
}
devaluation_currency_75 = {

		has_modifier = has_central_bank
		currency_market_goods_lake_ratio > 0.5

			OR = {
				has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_25
				has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_50
				has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_75

				has_law = law_type:law_revaluation_25
				has_law = law_type:law_revaluation_50

revaluation_currency_50 = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	is_valid = {
		var:revaluation_on = 0
		var:devaluation_on = 0
		has_technology_researched = central_banking
		has_modifier = has_central_bank
		currency_market_goods_lake_ratio < -0.5
		NOT = {
			OR = {
				has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_25
				has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_50
				has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_75

				has_law = law_type:law_revaluation_25
				has_law = law_type:law_revaluation_50
				has_law = law_type:law_revaluation_75

		}

					has_modifier = revaluation_currency_50

			add_modifier = {
				name = revaluation_currency_50
			}

devaluation_revaluation_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		var:revaluation_on = 0
		var:devaluation_on = 0
		has_technology_researched = monetary_policy_tools
	}
}
devaluation_rate_increase = {
	is_shown = {
		#var:money_value_target <= 10
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = devaluation_rate
				var:devaluation_rate < 200 #500
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = devaluation_rate
				add = 5
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_variable = devaluation_rate
					var:devaluation_rate > 65
					var:devaluation_rate <= 70

				}
				set_variable = {
					name = devaluation_time_1
					value = 5
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_variable = devaluation_rate
					var:devaluation_rate > 110
					var:devaluation_rate <= 115

				}
				set_variable = {
					name = devaluation_time_1
					value = 7.5
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_variable = devaluation_rate
					var:devaluation_rate > 155
					var:devaluation_rate <= 160

				}
				set_variable = {
					name = devaluation_time_1
					value = 10
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
devaluation_rate_reduce = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = devaluation_rate
				var:devaluation_rate > 25
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = devaluation_rate
				subtract = 5
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_variable = devaluation_rate
					var:devaluation_rate < 70
					var:devaluation_rate >= 65

				}
				set_variable = {
					name = devaluation_time_1
					value = 2.5
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_variable = devaluation_rate
					var:devaluation_rate < 115
					var:devaluation_rate >= 110

				}
				set_variable = {
					name = devaluation_time_1
					value = 5
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					has_variable = devaluation_rate
					var:devaluation_rate < 160
					var:devaluation_rate >= 155

				}
				set_variable = {
					name = devaluation_time_1
					value = 7.5
				}
			}

		}
	}
}
devaluation_time_increase = {
	is_shown = {
		#var:money_value_target <= 10
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = devaluation_time
				var:devaluation_time < 10 #500
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = devaluation_time
				add = 1
			}
		}
	}
}
devaluation_time_reduce = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = devaluation_time
				var:devaluation_time > 1
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = devaluation_time
				subtract = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

################################

################################

revaluation_rate_increase = {
	is_shown = {
		#var:money_value_target <= 10
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = revaluation_rate
				var:revaluation_rate < 95 #500
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = revaluation_rate
				add = 5
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_variable = revaluation_rate
					var:revaluation_rate > 65
					var:revaluation_rate <= 70

				}
				set_variable = {
					name = revaluation_time_1
					value = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
revaluation_rate_reduce = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = revaluation_rate
				var:revaluation_rate > 25
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = revaluation_rate
				subtract = 5
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_variable = revaluation_rate
					var:revaluation_rate < 70
					var:revaluation_rate >= 65

				}
				set_variable = {
					name = revaluation_time_1
					value = 2.5
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
revaluation_time_increase = {
	is_shown = {
		#var:money_value_target <= 10
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = revaluation_time
				var:revaluation_time < 5 #500
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = revaluation_time
				add = 1
			}
		}
	}
}
revaluation_time_reduce = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = revaluation_time
				var:revaluation_time > 1
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = revaluation_time
				subtract = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

################################

set_devaluation_rate = {
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = devaluation_on
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = { #to fixe the variable
			name = money_supply_predicted_add_devaluation_1_month_valided
			value = money_supply_predicted_add_devaluation_1
		}
		set_variable = { #to fixe the variable
			name = inflation_value_predicted_devaluation_month_valided
			value = inflation_value_predicted_devaluation_month
		}
		set_variable = { #to fixe the variable
			name = money_value_target_valided
			value = money_value_predicted_devaluation
		}


		add_modifier = {
			name = foreign_exchange_controls
			months = devaluation_time_1_month
		}
		#Reset law
		activate_law = law_type:law_no_monetary_policy
	}
}
set_revaluation_rate = {
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = revaluation_on
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = { #to fixe the variable
			name = money_supply_predicted_add_revaluation_1_month_valided
			value = money_supply_predicted_add_revaluation_1
		}
		set_variable = { #to fixe the variable
			name = inflation_value_predicted_revaluation_month_valided
			value = inflation_value_predicted_revaluation_month
		}
		set_variable = { #to fixe the variable
			name = money_value_target_valided
			value = money_value_predicted_revaluation
		}
		add_modifier = {
			name = foreign_exchange_controls
			months = revaluation_time_1_month
		}
		#Reset law
		activate_law = law_type:law_no_monetary_policy
	}
}

#market panel en ordre

is_global_monetary_reference_more_button_visibility = {
	is_shown = {
		has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
	}
}
sell_in_gold_on = {
	effect  = {
		set_variable = {
			name = sell_in_gold_on
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = sell_in_currency_on
			value = 0
		}
	}
}
sell_in_currency_on = {
	effect  = {
		set_variable = {
			name = sell_in_currency_on
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = sell_in_gold_on
			value = 0
		}
	}
}
buy_sell_currency_in_gold_on_button_visibility = {
	is_shown = {
		var:sell_in_gold_on = 1
	}
}
buy_sell_currency_in_currency_on_button_visibility = {
	is_shown = {
		var:sell_in_currency_on = 1
	}
}
purchase_of_bond_debt_visibility = {
	is_shown = {
		has_modifier = has_financial_center
		not = {
			or  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
				#has_modifier = extreme_weak_currency
			}
		}
	}
}

#autre
has_gold_exchange_standard_tech_more_button_visibility = {
	is_valid = {
		has_technology_researched = gold_exchange_standard
	}
	is_shown = {
		has_technology_researched = gold_exchange_standard
		var:sell_in_currency_on = 1
	}
}
has_gold_standard_no_gold_exchange_standard_tech_market_panel_visibility = {
	is_shown = {
		has_technology_researched = metalique_standart
		not = {
			has_technology_researched = gold_exchange_standard
			or  = {
				has_law = law_type:law_isolationism
				has_modifier = extreme_weak_currency
			}
		}
	}
}

# ███╗   ███╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗███████╗██╗   ██╗    ██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ██╗     ██╗   ██╗███████╗
# ████╗ ████║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║██╔════╝╚██╗ ██╔╝    ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██║     ██║   ██║██╔════╝
# ██╔████╔██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║█████╗   ╚████╔╝     ██║   ██║███████║██║     ██║   ██║█████╗
# ██║╚██╔╝██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║██╔══╝    ╚██╔╝      ╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══╝
# ██║ ╚═╝ ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║███████╗   ██║        ╚████╔╝ ██║  ██║███████╗╚██████╔╝███████╗
# ╚═╝     ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝   ╚═╝         ╚═══╝  ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝
#
# ████████╗ █████╗ ██████╗  ██████╗ ███████╗████████╗
# ╚══██╔══╝██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔════╝ ██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝
#    ██║   ███████║██████╔╝██║  ███╗█████╗     ██║
#    ██║   ██╔══██║██╔══██╗██║   ██║██╔══╝     ██║
#    ██║   ██║  ██║██║  ██║╚██████╔╝███████╗   ██║
#    ╚═╝   ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝   ╚═╝

#Metal
money_value_target_increase = {
	is_shown = {
		#var:money_value_target <= 10
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = money_value_target_2
				#var:money_value_target_1 > 0.5
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_2
				add = 0.1
			}
		}
	}
}
money_value_target_reduce = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = money_value_target_2
				var:money_value_target_2 > 0.1
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_2
				subtract = 0.1
			}
		}
	}
}
set_money_value_target = {
	is_valid = {
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = money_value_target_1
			value = var:money_value_target_2
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = money_value_target_time
			value = 1
		}
		remove_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		add_modifier = {
			name = foreign_exchange_controls
			months = 24
		}
		currency_strength_modifier = yes
	}
}

#reference_currency
money_value_target_with_the_reference_currency_increase = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = money_value_target_with_the_reference_currency_2
				var:money_value_target_with_the_reference_currency_2 < 1
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_with_the_reference_currency_2
				add = 0.1
			}
		}
	}
}
money_value_target_with_the_reference_currency_reduce = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = money_value_target_with_the_reference_currency_2
				var:money_value_target_with_the_reference_currency_2 > 0.1
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_with_the_reference_currency_2
				subtract = 0.1
			}
		}
	}
}
set_money_value_target_with_the_reference_currency = {
	is_valid = {
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = money_value_target_with_the_reference_currency_effective
			value = {
				add = global_monetary_reference
				multiply = var:money_value_target_with_the_reference_currency_2
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = money_value_target_with_the_reference_currency_1
			value = var:money_value_target_with_the_reference_currency_2
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = money_value_target_1
			value = var:money_value_target_with_the_reference_currency_effective
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = amount_reference_currency_to_ensure_parity_fixe #quantité de valeur de référence nécessaire pour assurer la parité
			value = amount_reference_currency_to_ensure_parity
		}
		remove_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		add_modifier = {
			name = foreign_exchange_controls
			months = 24
		}
		currency_strength_modifier = yes
	}
}

################################################################################################
################################################################################################
################################################################################################
################################################################################################

# ██████╗  █████╗ ██████╗ ██╗████████╗██╗   ██╗     ███████╗ ██████╗ █████╗ ██╗     ███████╗██████╗         ██████╗ ██╗   ██╗  ████████╗██╗  ██╗███████╗
# ██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██║╚══██╔══╝╚██╗ ██╔╝     ██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔══██╗██║     ██╔════╝██╔══██╗        ██╔══██╗╚██╗ ██╔╝  ╚══██╔══╝██║  ██║██╔════╝
# ██████╔╝███████║██████╔╝██║   ██║    ╚████╔╝      ███████╗██║     ███████║██║     █████╗  ██║  ██║        ██████╔╝ ╚████╔╝      ██║   ███████║█████╗
# ██╔═══╝ ██╔══██║██╔══██╗██║   ██║     ╚██╔╝       ╚════██║██║     ██╔══██║██║     ██╔══╝  ██║  ██║        ██╔══██╗  ╚██╔╝       ██║   ██╔══██║██╔══╝
# ██║     ██║  ██║██║  ██║██║   ██║      ██║███████╗███████║╚██████╗██║  ██║███████╗███████╗██████╔╝███████╗██████╔╝   ██║███████╗██║   ██║  ██║███████╗
# ╚═╝     ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝   ╚═╝      ╚═╝╚══════╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚═════╝ ╚══════╝╚═════╝    ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝   ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝
#
#          ██████╗ ██╗   ██╗███████╗██████╗ ██╗      ██████╗ ██████╗ ██████╗
#         ██╔═══██╗██║   ██║██╔════╝██╔══██╗██║     ██╔═══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══██╗
#         ██║   ██║██║   ██║█████╗  ██████╔╝██║     ██║   ██║██████╔╝██║  ██║
#         ██║   ██║╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══╝  ██╔══██╗██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██║  ██║
# ███████╗╚██████╔╝ ╚████╔╝ ███████╗██║  ██║███████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║██████╔╝
# ╚══════╝ ╚═════╝   ╚═══╝  ╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═════╝

# parity_scaled_by_the_overlord_1_enabled = {
# 	is_valid = {
# 		not = {
# 			parity_scaled_by_the_overlord = 1
# 		}
# 	}
# }
# parity_scaled_by_the_overlord_2_enabled = {
# 	is_valid = {
# 		not = {
# 			parity_scaled_by_the_overlord = 5
# 		}
# 	}
# }
# parity_scaled_by_the_overlord_3_enabled = {
# 	is_valid = {
# 		not = {
# 			parity_scaled_by_the_overlord = 10
# 		}
# 	}
# }
# parity_scaled_by_the_overlord_4_enabled = {
# 	is_valid = {
# 		not = {
# 			parity_scaled_by_the_overlord = 15
# 		}
# 	}
# }

parity_scaled_by_the_overlord_increase = {
	is_shown = {
		#var:parity_scaled_by_the_overlord <= 10
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = parity_scaled_by_the_overlord
				var:parity_scaled_by_the_overlord <10

			}
			change_variable = {
				name = parity_scaled_by_the_overlord
				add = 1
			}
		}
	}
}
parity_scaled_by_the_overlord_reduce = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = parity_scaled_by_the_overlord
				var:parity_scaled_by_the_overlord >1

			}
			change_variable = {
				name = parity_scaled_by_the_overlord
				subtract = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

# ███████╗ ██████╗ ██████╗ ███████╗██╗  ██╗        ███╗   ███╗ █████╗ ██████╗ ██╗  ██╗███████╗████████╗     ██████╗  █████╗ ███╗   ██╗███████╗██╗
# ██╔════╝██╔═══██╗██╔══██╗██╔════╝╚██╗██╔╝        ████╗ ████║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██║ ██╔╝██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝     ██╔══██╗██╔══██╗████╗  ██║██╔════╝██║
# █████╗  ██║   ██║██████╔╝█████╗   ╚███╔╝         ██╔████╔██║███████║██████╔╝█████╔╝ █████╗     ██║        ██████╔╝███████║██╔██╗ ██║█████╗  ██║
# ██╔══╝  ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══╝   ██╔██╗         ██║╚██╔╝██║██╔══██║██╔══██╗██╔═██╗ ██╔══╝     ██║        ██╔═══╝ ██╔══██║██║╚██╗██║██╔══╝  ██║
# ██║     ╚██████╔╝██║  ██║███████╗██╔╝ ██╗███████╗██║ ╚═╝ ██║██║  ██║██║  ██║██║  ██╗███████╗   ██║███████╗██║     ██║  ██║██║ ╚████║███████╗███████╗
# ╚═╝      ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝     ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝   ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝     ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝╚══════╝

currency_quantity_increase = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = currency_quantity
				#var:currency_quantity < market.owner.stockpiling_currency_state
				#var:currency_quantity < sell_limit_currency_var_rest
				var:currency_quantity < 20000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = currency_quantity
				add = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
currency_quantity_reduce = {
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = currency_quantity
				var:currency_quantity > 5000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = currency_quantity
				subtract = 5000000
			}
		}
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - dinar
buy_dinar_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_dinar > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_dinar_state
		player.valid_dinar_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_dinar > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_dinar_state
		valid_dinar_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
dinar_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dinaret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
dinar_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dinaret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dinaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dinaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dinaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dinaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - dinar_algerian_dinar
buy_dinar_algerian_dinar_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_dinar_algerian_dinar > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state
		player.valid_dinar_algerian_dinar_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_algerian_dinar_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_dinar_algerian_dinar > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state
		valid_dinar_algerian_dinar_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
dinar_algerian_dinar_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dinar_algerian_dinaret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_algerian_dinar_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_algerian_dinar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_algerian_dinar
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_algerian_dinar_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_algerian_dinar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_algerian_dinar
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
dinar_algerian_dinar_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dinar_algerian_dinaret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_algerian_dinar_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_algerian_dinar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_algerian_dinar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dinar_algerian_dinaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dinar_algerian_dinaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_algerian_dinar_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_algerian_dinar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_algerian_dinar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dinar_algerian_dinaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dinar_algerian_dinaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}

					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place

				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1

							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_iraqi_dinar

				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_iraqi_dinar
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

dinar_iraqi_dinar_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dinar_iraqi_dinaret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_iraqi_dinar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_iraqi_dinar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dinar_iraqi_dinaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dinar_iraqi_dinaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_iraqi_dinar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_iraqi_dinar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dinar_iraqi_dinaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dinar_iraqi_dinaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - dinar_libyan_dinar
buy_dinar_libyan_dinar_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_dinar_libyan_dinar > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state
		player.valid_dinar_libyan_dinar_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_libyan_dinar_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_dinar_libyan_dinar > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state
		valid_dinar_libyan_dinar_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
dinar_libyan_dinar_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dinar_libyan_dinaret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_libyan_dinar_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_libyan_dinar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_libyan_dinar
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_libyan_dinar_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_libyan_dinar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_libyan_dinar
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
dinar_libyan_dinar_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dinar_libyan_dinaret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_libyan_dinar_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_libyan_dinar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_libyan_dinar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dinar_libyan_dinaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dinar_libyan_dinaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_libyan_dinar_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_libyan_dinar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_libyan_dinar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dinar_libyan_dinaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dinar_libyan_dinaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}

				is_player = yes

			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dinar_moroccan_dirhamet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site

						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_moroccan_dirham
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
