					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_moroccan_dirham
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
dinar_moroccan_dirham_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dinar_moroccan_dirhamet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_moroccan_dirham
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_moroccan_dirham
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dinar_moroccan_dirhamet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dinar_moroccan_dirhamet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_moroccan_dirham
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_moroccan_dirham
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dinar_moroccan_dirhamet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dinar_moroccan_dirhamet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - dinar_omanian_rial
buy_dinar_omanian_rial_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_dinar_omanian_rial > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state
		player.valid_dinar_omanian_rial_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_omanian_rial_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_dinar_omanian_rial > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state
		valid_dinar_omanian_rial_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
dinar_omanian_rial_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dinar_omanian_rialet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_omanian_rial_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_omanian_rial
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_omanian_rial
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_omanian_rial_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_omanian_rial
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_omanian_rial
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
dinar_omanian_rial_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dinar_omanian_rialet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_omanian_rial_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_omanian_rial
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_omanian_rial
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dinar_omanian_rialet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dinar_omanian_rialet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_omanian_rial_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_omanian_rial
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_omanian_rial
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dinar_omanian_rialet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dinar_omanian_rialet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

		money_value_dinar_qiran > 0

		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}

		money_value_dinar_qiran > 0

				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}

				}
			}
		}

			}
		}

					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_qiran
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
dinar_qiran_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dinar_qiranet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_qiran_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_qiran
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_qiran
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dinar_qiranet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dinar_qiranet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_qiran_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_qiran
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_qiran
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dinar_qiranet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dinar_qiranet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - dinar_saudi_riyal
buy_dinar_saudi_riyal_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_dinar_saudi_riyal > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state
		player.valid_dinar_saudi_riyal_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_saudi_riyal_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_dinar_saudi_riyal > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state
		valid_dinar_saudi_riyal_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
dinar_saudi_riyal_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dinar_saudi_riyalet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_saudi_riyal_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_saudi_riyal
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_saudi_riyal
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_saudi_riyal_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_saudi_riyal
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_saudi_riyal
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
dinar_saudi_riyal_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dinar_saudi_riyalet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_saudi_riyal_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_saudi_riyal
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_saudi_riyal
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dinar_saudi_riyalet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dinar_saudi_riyalet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_saudi_riyal_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_saudi_riyal
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_saudi_riyal
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dinar_saudi_riyalet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dinar_saudi_riyalet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}

		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state

			}

dinar_serbian_dinar_buy_in_gold = {

			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dinar_serbian_dinaret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_serbian_dinar_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes

				#metal

					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_serbian_dinar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_serbian_dinar
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_serbian_dinar_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_serbian_dinar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_serbian_dinar
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
dinar_serbian_dinar_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dinar_serbian_dinaret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_serbian_dinar_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_serbian_dinar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_serbian_dinar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dinar_serbian_dinaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dinar_serbian_dinaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_serbian_dinar_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_serbian_dinar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_serbian_dinar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dinar_serbian_dinaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dinar_serbian_dinaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - dinar_tunisian_dinar
buy_dinar_tunisian_dinar_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_dinar_tunisian_dinar > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state
		player.valid_dinar_tunisian_dinar_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_dinar_tunisian_dinar_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_dinar_tunisian_dinar > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state
		valid_dinar_tunisian_dinar_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
dinar_tunisian_dinar_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dinar_tunisian_dinaret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_tunisian_dinar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_tunisian_dinar
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_tunisian_dinar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_tunisian_dinar
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
dinar_tunisian_dinar_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dinar_tunisian_dinaret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_tunisian_dinar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_tunisian_dinar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dinar_tunisian_dinaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dinar_tunisian_dinaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_tunisian_dinar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_tunisian_dinar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dinar_tunisian_dinaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dinar_tunisian_dinaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls

			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}

					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1

							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity

					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_yugoslav_dinar
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
dinar_yugoslav_dinar_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dinar_yugoslav_dinaret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_yugoslav_dinar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_yugoslav_dinar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dinar_yugoslav_dinaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dinar_yugoslav_dinaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dinar_yugoslav_dinar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dinar_yugoslav_dinar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dinar_yugoslav_dinaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dinar_yugoslav_dinaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - dollar_australian_dollar
buy_dollar_australian_dollar_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_dollar_australian_dollar > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state
		player.valid_dollar_australian_dollar_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_dollar_australian_dollar_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_dollar_australian_dollar > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state
		valid_dollar_australian_dollar_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
dollar_australian_dollar_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dollar_australian_dollaret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_australian_dollar_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_australian_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_australian_dollar
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_australian_dollar_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_australian_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_australian_dollar
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
dollar_australian_dollar_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dollar_australian_dollaret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_australian_dollar_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_australian_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_australian_dollar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dollar_australian_dollaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dollar_australian_dollaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_australian_dollar_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_australian_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_australian_dollar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dollar_australian_dollaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dollar_australian_dollaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}

			has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency

				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency
