			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dollar_canadian_dollaret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_canadian_dollar_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_canadian_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_canadian_dollar
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_canadian_dollar_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_canadian_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_canadian_dollar
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
dollar_canadian_dollar_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dollar_canadian_dollaret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_canadian_dollar_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_canadian_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_canadian_dollar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dollar_canadian_dollaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dollar_canadian_dollaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_canadian_dollar_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_canadian_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_canadian_dollar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dollar_canadian_dollaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dollar_canadian_dollaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - dollar_caribbean_dollar
buy_dollar_caribbean_dollar_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_dollar_caribbean_dollar > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state
		player.valid_dollar_caribbean_dollar_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_dollar_caribbean_dollar_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_dollar_caribbean_dollar > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state
		valid_dollar_caribbean_dollar_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
dollar_caribbean_dollar_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dollar_caribbean_dollaret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_caribbean_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_caribbean_dollar
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_caribbean_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_caribbean_dollar
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
dollar_caribbean_dollar_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dollar_caribbean_dollaret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_caribbean_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_caribbean_dollar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dollar_caribbean_dollaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dollar_caribbean_dollaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_caribbean_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_caribbean_dollar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dollar_caribbean_dollaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dollar_caribbean_dollaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

#in_gold - dollar_confederate_states_dollar

		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}

	is_valid = {
		money_value_dollar_confederate_states_dollar > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state
		valid_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}

dollar_confederate_states_dollar_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dollar_confederate_states_dollaret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_confederate_states_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_confederate_states_dollar
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_confederate_states_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_confederate_states_dollar
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
dollar_confederate_states_dollar_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dollar_confederate_states_dollaret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_confederate_states_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_confederate_states_dollar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dollar_confederate_states_dollaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dollar_confederate_states_dollaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_confederate_states_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_confederate_states_dollar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dollar_confederate_states_dollaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dollar_confederate_states_dollaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - dollar_liberian_dollar
buy_dollar_liberian_dollar_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_dollar_liberian_dollar > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state
		player.valid_dollar_liberian_dollar_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_dollar_liberian_dollar_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_dollar_liberian_dollar > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state
		valid_dollar_liberian_dollar_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
dollar_liberian_dollar_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dollar_liberian_dollaret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_liberian_dollar_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_liberian_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_liberian_dollar
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_liberian_dollar_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_liberian_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_liberian_dollar
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
dollar_liberian_dollar_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dollar_liberian_dollaret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_liberian_dollar_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_liberian_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_liberian_dollar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dollar_liberian_dollaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dollar_liberian_dollaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_liberian_dollar_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_liberian_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_liberian_dollar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dollar_liberian_dollaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dollar_liberian_dollaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

#in_gold - dollar_new_zealand_dollar
buy_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_dollar_new_zealand_dollar > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_state
		player.valid_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_dollar_new_zealand_dollar > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_state
		valid_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
dollar_new_zealand_dollar_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dollar_new_zealand_dollaret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_new_zealand_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_new_zealand_dollar
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_new_zealand_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_new_zealand_dollar
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
dollar_new_zealand_dollar_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dollar_new_zealand_dollaret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_new_zealand_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_new_zealand_dollar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dollar_new_zealand_dollaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dollar_new_zealand_dollaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_new_zealand_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_new_zealand_dollar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dollar_new_zealand_dollaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dollar_new_zealand_dollaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar
buy_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state
		player.valid_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state
		valid_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dollar_sierra_leonean_dollaret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dollar_sierra_leonean_dollaret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dollar_sierra_leonean_dollaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dollar_sierra_leonean_dollaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dollar_sierra_leonean_dollaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dollar_sierra_leonean_dollaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - dollar_united_states_dollar
buy_dollar_united_states_dollar_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_dollar_united_states_dollar > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state
		player.valid_dollar_united_states_dollar_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_dollar_united_states_dollar_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_dollar_united_states_dollar > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state
		valid_dollar_united_states_dollar_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_dollar_united_states_dollar_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_united_states_dollar_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
dollar_united_states_dollar_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dollar_united_states_dollaret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_united_states_dollar_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_united_states_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_united_states_dollar
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_united_states_dollar_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_united_states_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_united_states_dollar
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
dollar_united_states_dollar_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = dollar_united_states_dollaret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_united_states_dollar_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_united_states_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_united_states_dollar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dollar_united_states_dollaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_united_states_dollar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dollar_united_states_dollar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dollar_united_states_dollaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dollar_united_states_dollar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_united_states_dollar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_dollar_united_states_dollar_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_dollar_united_states_dollar
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_dollar_united_states_dollar
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:dollar_united_states_dollaret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_united_states_dollar_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_dollar_united_states_dollar_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:dollar_united_states_dollaret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_dollar_united_states_dollar_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_dollar_united_states_dollar_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

		money_value_eco_ariary > 0

			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}

					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes

						name = silver_state_1
