							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_ariary
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
eco_ariary_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = eco_ariaryet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_ariary_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_ariary
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_ariary
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:eco_ariaryet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_ariary_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_eco_ariary_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:eco_ariaryet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_eco_ariary_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_ariary_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_ariary_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_ariary
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_ariary
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:eco_ariaryet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_ariary_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_eco_ariary_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:eco_ariaryet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_eco_ariary_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_ariary_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - eco_central_african_eco
buy_eco_central_african_eco_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_eco_central_african_eco > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state
		player.valid_eco_central_african_eco_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_eco_central_african_eco_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_eco_central_african_eco > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state
		valid_eco_central_african_eco_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_eco_central_african_eco_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_central_african_eco_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
eco_central_african_eco_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = eco_central_african_ecoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_central_african_eco_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_central_african_eco
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_central_african_eco
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_central_african_eco_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_central_african_eco
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_central_african_eco
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
eco_central_african_eco_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = eco_central_african_ecoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_central_african_eco_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_central_african_eco
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_central_african_eco
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:eco_central_african_ecoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_central_african_eco_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_eco_central_african_eco_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:eco_central_african_ecoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_eco_central_african_eco_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_central_african_eco_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_central_african_eco_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_central_african_eco
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_central_african_eco
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:eco_central_african_ecoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_central_african_eco_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_eco_central_african_eco_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:eco_central_african_ecoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_eco_central_african_eco_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_central_african_eco_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}

		}

		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = eco_east_african_ecoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_east_african_eco_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_east_african_eco
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_east_african_eco
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_east_african_eco_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_east_african_eco
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_east_african_eco
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
eco_east_african_eco_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = eco_east_african_ecoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_east_african_eco_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_east_african_eco
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_east_african_eco
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:eco_east_african_ecoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_east_african_eco_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_eco_east_african_eco_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:eco_east_african_ecoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_eco_east_african_eco_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_east_african_eco_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_east_african_eco_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_east_african_eco
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_east_african_eco
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:eco_east_african_ecoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_east_african_eco_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_eco_east_african_eco_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:eco_east_african_ecoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_eco_east_african_eco_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_east_african_eco_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - eco_ethiopian_birr
buy_eco_ethiopian_birr_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_eco_ethiopian_birr > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state
		player.valid_eco_ethiopian_birr_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_eco_ethiopian_birr_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_eco_ethiopian_birr > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state
		valid_eco_ethiopian_birr_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_eco_ethiopian_birr_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_ethiopian_birr_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
eco_ethiopian_birr_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = eco_ethiopian_birret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_ethiopian_birr_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_ethiopian_birr
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_ethiopian_birr
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_ethiopian_birr_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_ethiopian_birr
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_ethiopian_birr
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
eco_ethiopian_birr_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = eco_ethiopian_birret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_ethiopian_birr_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_ethiopian_birr
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_ethiopian_birr
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:eco_ethiopian_birret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_ethiopian_birr_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_eco_ethiopian_birr_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:eco_ethiopian_birret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_eco_ethiopian_birr_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_ethiopian_birr_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_ethiopian_birr_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_ethiopian_birr
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_ethiopian_birr
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:eco_ethiopian_birret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_ethiopian_birr_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_eco_ethiopian_birr_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:eco_ethiopian_birret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_eco_ethiopian_birr_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_ethiopian_birr_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

#in_gold - eco_ghanaian_pound
buy_eco_ghanaian_pound_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_eco_ghanaian_pound > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state
		player.valid_eco_ghanaian_pound_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_eco_ghanaian_pound_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_eco_ghanaian_pound > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state
		valid_eco_ghanaian_pound_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
eco_ghanaian_pound_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = eco_ghanaian_poundet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_ghanaian_pound_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_ghanaian_pound
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_ghanaian_pound
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_ghanaian_pound_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_ghanaian_pound
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_ghanaian_pound
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
eco_ghanaian_pound_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = eco_ghanaian_poundet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_ghanaian_pound_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_ghanaian_pound
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_ghanaian_pound
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:eco_ghanaian_poundet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:eco_ghanaian_poundet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_ghanaian_pound_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_ghanaian_pound
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_ghanaian_pound
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:eco_ghanaian_poundet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:eco_ghanaian_poundet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - eco_nigerian_naira
buy_eco_nigerian_naira_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_eco_nigerian_naira > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state
		player.valid_eco_nigerian_naira_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_eco_nigerian_naira_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_eco_nigerian_naira > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state
		valid_eco_nigerian_naira_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
eco_nigerian_naira_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = eco_nigerian_nairaet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_nigerian_naira_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_nigerian_naira
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_nigerian_naira
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_nigerian_naira_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_nigerian_naira
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_nigerian_naira
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
eco_nigerian_naira_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = eco_nigerian_nairaet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_nigerian_naira_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_nigerian_naira
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_nigerian_naira
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:eco_nigerian_nairaet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:eco_nigerian_nairaet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_nigerian_naira_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_nigerian_naira
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_nigerian_naira
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:eco_nigerian_nairaet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:eco_nigerian_nairaet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

buy_eco_south_african_rand_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_eco_south_african_rand > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state
		player.valid_eco_south_african_rand_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}

	is_valid = {
		money_value_eco_south_african_rand > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state
		valid_eco_south_african_rand_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
eco_south_african_rand_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = eco_south_african_randet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_south_african_rand_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_south_african_rand
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_south_african_rand
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_south_african_rand_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_south_african_rand
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_south_african_rand
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
eco_south_african_rand_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = eco_south_african_randet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_south_african_rand_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_south_african_rand
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_south_african_rand
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:eco_south_african_randet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:eco_south_african_randet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_south_african_rand_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_south_african_rand
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_south_african_rand
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:eco_south_african_randet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:eco_south_african_randet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - eco_tuareg_ouguiya
buy_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_eco_tuareg_ouguiya > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state
		player.valid_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_eco_tuareg_ouguiya > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state
		valid_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
eco_tuareg_ouguiya_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = eco_tuareg_ouguiyaet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_tuareg_ouguiya
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_tuareg_ouguiya
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_tuareg_ouguiya
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_tuareg_ouguiya
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
eco_tuareg_ouguiya_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = eco_tuareg_ouguiyaet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_tuareg_ouguiya
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_tuareg_ouguiya
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:eco_tuareg_ouguiyaet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:eco_tuareg_ouguiyaet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_eco_tuareg_ouguiya
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_eco_tuareg_ouguiya
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:eco_tuareg_ouguiyaet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:eco_tuareg_ouguiyaet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

#in_gold - eco_west_african_eco

		money_value_eco_west_african_eco > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state

		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}

	is_valid = {
		money_value_eco_west_african_eco > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state
		valid_eco_west_african_eco_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_eco_west_african_eco_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_west_african_eco_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
