			limit = {
				law_gulden_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_gulden
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_gulden
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_gulden_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_gulden
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_gulden
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
gulden_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = guldenet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_gulden_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_gulden
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_gulden
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:guldenet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:guldenet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_gulden_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_gulden
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_gulden
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:guldenet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:guldenet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - gulden_bavarian_gulden
buy_gulden_bavarian_gulden_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_gulden_bavarian_gulden > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state
		player.valid_gulden_bavarian_gulden_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_gulden_bavarian_gulden_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_gulden_bavarian_gulden > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state
		valid_gulden_bavarian_gulden_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
gulden_bavarian_gulden_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = gulden_bavarian_guldenet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_gulden_bavarian_gulden
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_gulden_bavarian_gulden
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_gulden_bavarian_gulden
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_gulden_bavarian_gulden
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
gulden_bavarian_gulden_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = gulden_bavarian_guldenet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_gulden_bavarian_gulden
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_gulden_bavarian_gulden
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:gulden_bavarian_guldenet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:gulden_bavarian_guldenet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_gulden_bavarian_gulden
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_gulden_bavarian_gulden
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:gulden_bavarian_guldenet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:gulden_bavarian_guldenet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - gulden_florin
buy_gulden_florin_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_gulden_florin > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_gulden_florin_state
		player.valid_gulden_florin_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_gulden_florin_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_gulden_florin > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_gulden_florin_state
		valid_gulden_florin_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
gulden_florin_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = gulden_florinet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_gulden_florin_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_gulden_florin
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_gulden_florin
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_gulden_florin_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_gulden_florin
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_gulden_florin
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
gulden_florin_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = gulden_florinet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_gulden_florin_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_gulden_florin
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_gulden_florin
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:gulden_florinet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:gulden_florinet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_gulden_florin_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_gulden_florin
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_gulden_florin
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:gulden_florinet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:gulden_florinet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - gulden_hungarian_forint
buy_gulden_hungarian_forint_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_gulden_hungarian_forint > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state
		player.valid_gulden_hungarian_forint_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_gulden_hungarian_forint_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_gulden_hungarian_forint > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state
		valid_gulden_hungarian_forint_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
gulden_hungarian_forint_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = gulden_hungarian_forintet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_gulden_hungarian_forint_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_gulden_hungarian_forint
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_gulden_hungarian_forint
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_gulden_hungarian_forint_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_gulden_hungarian_forint
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_gulden_hungarian_forint
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
gulden_hungarian_forint_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = gulden_hungarian_forintet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_gulden_hungarian_forint_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_gulden_hungarian_forint
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_gulden_hungarian_forint
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:gulden_hungarian_forintet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:gulden_hungarian_forintet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_gulden_hungarian_forint_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_gulden_hungarian_forint
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_gulden_hungarian_forint
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:gulden_hungarian_forintet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:gulden_hungarian_forintet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls

	}

				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_indies_guilder_currency

		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls

gulden_indies_guilder_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = gulden_indies_guilderet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_gulden_indies_guilder_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_gulden_indies_guilder
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_gulden_indies_guilder
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_gulden_indies_guilder_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_gulden_indies_guilder
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_gulden_indies_guilder
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
gulden_indies_guilder_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = gulden_indies_guilderet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_gulden_indies_guilder_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_gulden_indies_guilder
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_gulden_indies_guilder
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:gulden_indies_guilderet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_gulden_indies_guilder_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_gulden_indies_guilder_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:gulden_indies_guilderet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_gulden_indies_guilder_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_gulden_indies_guilder_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_gulden_indies_guilder_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_gulden_indies_guilder
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_gulden_indies_guilder
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:gulden_indies_guilderet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_gulden_indies_guilder_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_gulden_indies_guilder_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:gulden_indies_guilderet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_gulden_indies_guilder_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_gulden_indies_guilder_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - gulden_south_german_gulden
buy_gulden_south_german_gulden_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_gulden_south_german_gulden > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state
		player.valid_gulden_south_german_gulden_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_gulden_south_german_gulden_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_gulden_south_german_gulden > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state
		valid_gulden_south_german_gulden_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_gulden_south_german_gulden_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_south_german_gulden_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
gulden_south_german_gulden_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = gulden_south_german_guldenet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_gulden_south_german_gulden_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_gulden_south_german_gulden
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_gulden_south_german_gulden
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_gulden_south_german_gulden_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_gulden_south_german_gulden
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_gulden_south_german_gulden
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
gulden_south_german_gulden_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = gulden_south_german_guldenet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_gulden_south_german_gulden_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_gulden_south_german_gulden
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_gulden_south_german_gulden
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:gulden_south_german_guldenet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_gulden_south_german_gulden_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_gulden_south_german_gulden_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:gulden_south_german_guldenet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_gulden_south_german_gulden_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_gulden_south_german_gulden_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_gulden_south_german_gulden_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_gulden_south_german_gulden
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_gulden_south_german_gulden
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:gulden_south_german_guldenet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_gulden_south_german_gulden_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_gulden_south_german_gulden_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:gulden_south_german_guldenet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_gulden_south_german_gulden_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_gulden_south_german_gulden_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

#in_gold - krone_czech_koruna
buy_krone_czech_koruna_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_krone_czech_koruna > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state
		player.valid_krone_czech_koruna_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_krone_czech_koruna_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_krone_czech_koruna > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state
		valid_krone_czech_koruna_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_krone_czech_koruna_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_czech_koruna_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
krone_czech_koruna_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = krone_czech_korunaet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_krone_czech_koruna_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_krone_czech_koruna
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_krone_czech_koruna
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_krone_czech_koruna_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_krone_czech_koruna
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_krone_czech_koruna
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
krone_czech_koruna_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = krone_czech_korunaet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_krone_czech_koruna_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_krone_czech_koruna
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_krone_czech_koruna
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:krone_czech_korunaet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_krone_czech_koruna_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_krone_czech_koruna_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:krone_czech_korunaet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_krone_czech_koruna_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_krone_czech_koruna_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_krone_czech_koruna_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_krone_czech_koruna
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_krone_czech_koruna
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:krone_czech_korunaet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_krone_czech_koruna_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_krone_czech_koruna_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:krone_czech_korunaet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_krone_czech_koruna_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_krone_czech_koruna_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - krone_danish_krone
buy_krone_danish_krone_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_krone_danish_krone > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state
		player.valid_krone_danish_krone_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_krone_danish_krone_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_krone_danish_krone > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state
		valid_krone_danish_krone_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_krone_danish_krone_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_danish_krone_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
krone_danish_krone_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = krone_danish_kroneet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_krone_danish_krone_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_krone_danish_krone
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_krone_danish_krone
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_krone_danish_krone_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_krone_danish_krone
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_krone_danish_krone
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
krone_danish_krone_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = krone_danish_kroneet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_krone_danish_krone_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_krone_danish_krone
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_krone_danish_krone
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:krone_danish_kroneet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_krone_danish_krone_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_krone_danish_krone_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:krone_danish_kroneet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_krone_danish_krone_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_krone_danish_krone_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_krone_danish_krone_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_krone_danish_krone
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_krone_danish_krone
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:krone_danish_kroneet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_krone_danish_krone_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_krone_danish_krone_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:krone_danish_kroneet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_krone_danish_krone_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_krone_danish_krone_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = krone_estonian_kroonet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes

					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_krone_estonian_kroon
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_krone_estonian_kroon_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes

			scope:central_bank_site = {

				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
