						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_krone_estonian_kroon
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_krone_estonian_kroon
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
krone_estonian_kroon_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = krone_estonian_kroonet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_krone_estonian_kroon_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_krone_estonian_kroon
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_krone_estonian_kroon
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:krone_estonian_kroonet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_krone_estonian_kroon_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_krone_estonian_kroon_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:krone_estonian_kroonet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_krone_estonian_kroon_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_krone_estonian_kroon_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_krone_estonian_kroon_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_krone_estonian_kroon
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_krone_estonian_kroon
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:krone_estonian_kroonet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_krone_estonian_kroon_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_krone_estonian_kroon_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:krone_estonian_kroonet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_krone_estonian_kroon_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_krone_estonian_kroon_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - krone_icelandic_krona
buy_krone_icelandic_krona_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_krone_icelandic_krona > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state
		player.valid_krone_icelandic_krona_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_krone_icelandic_krona_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_krone_icelandic_krona > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state
		valid_krone_icelandic_krona_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_krone_icelandic_krona_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_icelandic_krona_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
krone_icelandic_krona_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = krone_icelandic_kronaet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_krone_icelandic_krona_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_krone_icelandic_krona
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_krone_icelandic_krona
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_krone_icelandic_krona_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_krone_icelandic_krona
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_krone_icelandic_krona
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
krone_icelandic_krona_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = krone_icelandic_kronaet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_krone_icelandic_krona_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_krone_icelandic_krona
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_krone_icelandic_krona
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:krone_icelandic_kronaet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_krone_icelandic_krona_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_krone_icelandic_krona_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:krone_icelandic_kronaet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_krone_icelandic_krona_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_krone_icelandic_krona_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_krone_icelandic_krona_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_krone_icelandic_krona
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_krone_icelandic_krona
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:krone_icelandic_kronaet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_krone_icelandic_krona_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_krone_icelandic_krona_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:krone_icelandic_kronaet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_krone_icelandic_krona_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_krone_icelandic_krona_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

#in_gold - krone_norwegian_krone
buy_krone_norwegian_krone_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_krone_norwegian_krone > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_state
		player.valid_krone_norwegian_krone_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}

	is_valid = {
		money_value_krone_norwegian_krone > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_state
		valid_krone_norwegian_krone_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_krone_norwegian_krone_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_norwegian_krone_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}

krone_norwegian_krone_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = krone_norwegian_kroneet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_krone_norwegian_krone_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_krone_norwegian_krone
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_krone_norwegian_krone
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_krone_norwegian_krone_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_krone_norwegian_krone
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_krone_norwegian_krone
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
krone_norwegian_krone_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = krone_norwegian_kroneet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_krone_norwegian_krone_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_krone_norwegian_krone
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_krone_norwegian_krone
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:krone_norwegian_kroneet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_krone_norwegian_krone_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_krone_norwegian_krone_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:krone_norwegian_kroneet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_krone_norwegian_krone_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_krone_norwegian_krone_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_krone_norwegian_krone_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_krone_norwegian_krone
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_krone_norwegian_krone
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:krone_norwegian_kroneet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_krone_norwegian_krone_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_krone_norwegian_krone_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:krone_norwegian_kroneet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_krone_norwegian_krone_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_krone_norwegian_krone_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - krone_slovak_koruna
buy_krone_slovak_koruna_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_krone_slovak_koruna > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_state
		player.valid_krone_slovak_koruna_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_krone_slovak_koruna_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_krone_slovak_koruna > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_state
		valid_krone_slovak_koruna_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_krone_slovak_koruna_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_slovak_koruna_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
krone_slovak_koruna_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = krone_slovak_korunaet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_krone_slovak_koruna_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_krone_slovak_koruna
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_krone_slovak_koruna
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_krone_slovak_koruna_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_krone_slovak_koruna
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_krone_slovak_koruna
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
krone_slovak_koruna_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = krone_slovak_korunaet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_krone_slovak_koruna_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_krone_slovak_koruna
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_krone_slovak_koruna
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:krone_slovak_korunaet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_krone_slovak_koruna_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_krone_slovak_koruna_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:krone_slovak_korunaet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_krone_slovak_koruna_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_krone_slovak_koruna_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_krone_slovak_koruna_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_krone_slovak_koruna
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_krone_slovak_koruna
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:krone_slovak_korunaet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_krone_slovak_koruna_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_krone_slovak_koruna_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:krone_slovak_korunaet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_krone_slovak_koruna_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_krone_slovak_koruna_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - krone_swedish_krona
buy_krone_swedish_krona_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_krone_swedish_krona > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_state
		player.valid_krone_swedish_krona_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_krone_swedish_krona_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_krone_swedish_krona > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_state
		valid_krone_swedish_krona_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_krone_swedish_krona_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_swedish_krona_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
krone_swedish_krona_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = krone_swedish_kronaet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_krone_swedish_krona_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_krone_swedish_krona
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_krone_swedish_krona
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_krone_swedish_krona_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_krone_swedish_krona
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_krone_swedish_krona
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
krone_swedish_krona_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = krone_swedish_kronaet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_krone_swedish_krona_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_krone_swedish_krona
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_krone_swedish_krona
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:krone_swedish_kronaet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_krone_swedish_krona_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_krone_swedish_krona_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:krone_swedish_kronaet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_krone_swedish_krona_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_krone_swedish_krona_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_krone_swedish_krona_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_krone_swedish_krona
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_krone_swedish_krona
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:krone_swedish_kronaet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_krone_swedish_krona_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_krone_swedish_krona_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:krone_swedish_kronaet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_krone_swedish_krona_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_krone_swedish_krona_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - leon_leu
buy_leon_leu_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_leon_leu > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_leon_leu_state
		player.valid_leon_leu_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_leon_leu_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_leon_leu > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_leon_leu_state
		valid_leon_leu_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_leon_leu_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_leon_leu_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
leon_leu_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = leon_leuet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_leon_leu_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_leon_leu
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_leon_leu_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_leon_leu
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leon_leu_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_leon_leu_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_leon_leu
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_leon_leu_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_leon_leu
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leon_leu_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
leon_leu_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = leon_leuet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_leon_leu_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_leon_leu
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_leon_leu_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_leon_leu
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:leon_leuet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_leon_leu_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_leon_leu_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leon_leu_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:leon_leuet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_leon_leu_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_leon_leu_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leon_leu_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_leon_leu_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_leon_leu_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_leon_leu_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_leon_leu_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_leon_leu_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_leon_leu_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_leon_leu_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_leon_leu_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_leon_leu_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_leon_leu_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_leon_leu_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_leon_leu_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_leon_leu
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_leon_leu_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_leon_leu
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:leon_leuet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_leon_leu_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_leon_leu_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leon_leu_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:leon_leuet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_leon_leu_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_leon_leu_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leon_leu_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_leon_leu_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_leon_leu_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_leon_leu_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_leon_leu_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_leon_leu_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_leon_leu_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_leon_leu_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_leon_leu_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_leon_leu_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_leon_leu_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_leon_leu_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - leon_lev
buy_leon_lev_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_leon_lev > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_leon_lev_state
		player.valid_leon_lev_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_leon_lev_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_leon_lev > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_leon_lev_state
		valid_leon_lev_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_leon_lev_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_leon_lev_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
leon_lev_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = leon_levet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_leon_lev_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_leon_lev
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_leon_lev_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_leon_lev
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leon_lev_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_leon_lev_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_leon_lev
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_leon_lev_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_leon_lev
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leon_lev_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
leon_lev_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = leon_levet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_leon_lev_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_leon_lev
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_leon_lev_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_leon_lev
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:leon_levet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_leon_lev_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_leon_lev_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leon_lev_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:leon_levet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_leon_lev_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_leon_lev_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leon_lev_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_leon_lev_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_leon_lev_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_leon_lev_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_leon_lev_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_leon_lev_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_leon_lev_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_leon_lev_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_leon_lev_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_leon_lev_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_leon_lev_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_leon_lev_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_leon_lev_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_leon_lev
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_leon_lev_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_leon_lev
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:leon_levet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_leon_lev_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_leon_lev_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leon_lev_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:leon_levet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_leon_lev_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_leon_lev_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leon_lev_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_leon_lev_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_leon_lev_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_leon_lev_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_leon_lev_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_leon_lev_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_leon_lev_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_leon_lev_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_leon_lev_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_leon_lev_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_leon_lev_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_leon_lev_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - lira
buy_lira_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_lira > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_lira_state
		player.valid_lira_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_lira_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_lira > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_lira_state
		valid_lira_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
lira_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = liraet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_lira_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_lira
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_lira
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_lira_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_lira
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_lira
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
lira_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = liraet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_lira_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_lira
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_lira
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:liraet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:liraet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_lira_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_lira_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_lira_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_lira_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_lira_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_lira
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_lira
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:liraet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:liraet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_lira_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_lira_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_lira_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_lira_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################
