#in_gold - lira_ducato
buy_lira_ducato_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_lira_ducato > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_lira_ducato_state
		player.valid_lira_ducato_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_lira_ducato_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_lira_ducato > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_lira_ducato_state
		valid_lira_ducato_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_lira_ducato_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_ducato_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
lira_ducato_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = lira_ducatoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_lira_ducato_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_lira_ducato
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_lira_ducato
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_lira_ducato_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_lira_ducato
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_lira_ducato
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
lira_ducato_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = lira_ducatoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_lira_ducato_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_lira_ducato
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_lira_ducato
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:lira_ducatoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_lira_ducato_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_lira_ducato_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:lira_ducatoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_lira_ducato_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_lira_ducato_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_lira_ducato_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_lira_ducato_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_lira_ducato
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_lira_ducato
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:lira_ducatoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_lira_ducato_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_lira_ducato_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:lira_ducatoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_lira_ducato_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_lira_ducato_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_lira_ducato_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - lira_ottoman_lira
buy_lira_ottoman_lira_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_lira_ottoman_lira > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_state
		player.valid_lira_ottoman_lira_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_lira_ottoman_lira_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_lira_ottoman_lira > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_state
		valid_lira_ottoman_lira_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_lira_ottoman_lira_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_ottoman_lira_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
lira_ottoman_lira_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = lira_ottoman_liraet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_lira_ottoman_lira_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_lira_ottoman_lira
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_lira_ottoman_lira
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_lira_ottoman_lira_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_lira_ottoman_lira
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_lira_ottoman_lira
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
lira_ottoman_lira_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = lira_ottoman_liraet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_lira_ottoman_lira_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_lira_ottoman_lira
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_lira_ottoman_lira
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:lira_ottoman_liraet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_lira_ottoman_lira_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_lira_ottoman_lira_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:lira_ottoman_liraet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_lira_ottoman_lira_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_lira_ottoman_lira_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_lira_ottoman_lira_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_lira_ottoman_lira
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_lira_ottoman_lira
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:lira_ottoman_liraet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_lira_ottoman_lira_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_lira_ottoman_lira_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:lira_ottoman_liraet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_lira_ottoman_lira_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_lira_ottoman_lira_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - lira_scudo_pontificio
buy_lira_scudo_pontificio_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_lira_scudo_pontificio > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_state
		player.valid_lira_scudo_pontificio_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_lira_scudo_pontificio_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_lira_scudo_pontificio > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_state
		valid_lira_scudo_pontificio_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_pontificio_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_pontificio_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
lira_scudo_pontificio_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = lira_scudo_pontificioet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_lira_scudo_pontificio_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_lira_scudo_pontificio
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_lira_scudo_pontificio
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_lira_scudo_pontificio_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_lira_scudo_pontificio
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_lira_scudo_pontificio
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
lira_scudo_pontificio_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = lira_scudo_pontificioet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_lira_scudo_pontificio_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_lira_scudo_pontificio
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_lira_scudo_pontificio
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:lira_scudo_pontificioet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_pontificio_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_pontificio_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:lira_scudo_pontificioet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_pontificio_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_pontificio_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_lira_scudo_pontificio_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_lira_scudo_pontificio
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_lira_scudo_pontificio
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:lira_scudo_pontificioet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_pontificio_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_pontificio_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:lira_scudo_pontificioet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_pontificio_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_pontificio_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - lira_scudo_sardo
buy_lira_scudo_sardo_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_lira_scudo_sardo > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state
		player.valid_lira_scudo_sardo_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_lira_scudo_sardo_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_lira_scudo_sardo > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state
		valid_lira_scudo_sardo_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_sardo_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_sardo_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
lira_scudo_sardo_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = lira_scudo_sardoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_lira_scudo_sardo_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_lira_scudo_sardo
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_lira_scudo_sardo
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_lira_scudo_sardo_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_lira_scudo_sardo
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_lira_scudo_sardo
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
lira_scudo_sardo_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = lira_scudo_sardoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_lira_scudo_sardo_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_lira_scudo_sardo
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_lira_scudo_sardo
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:lira_scudo_sardoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_sardo_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_sardo_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:lira_scudo_sardoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_sardo_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_sardo_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_lira_scudo_sardo_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_lira_scudo_sardo
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_lira_scudo_sardo
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:lira_scudo_sardoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_sardo_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_sardo_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:lira_scudo_sardoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_sardo_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_sardo_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - lira_toscane_lira
buy_lira_toscane_lira_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_lira_toscane_lira > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state
		player.valid_lira_toscane_lira_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_lira_toscane_lira_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_lira_toscane_lira > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state
		valid_lira_toscane_lira_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_lira_toscane_lira_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_toscane_lira_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
lira_toscane_lira_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = lira_toscane_liraet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_lira_toscane_lira_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_lira_toscane_lira
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_lira_toscane_lira
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_lira_toscane_lira_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_lira_toscane_lira
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_lira_toscane_lira
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
lira_toscane_lira_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = lira_toscane_liraet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_lira_toscane_lira_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_lira_toscane_lira
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_lira_toscane_lira
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:lira_toscane_liraet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_lira_toscane_lira_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_lira_toscane_lira_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:lira_toscane_liraet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_lira_toscane_lira_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_lira_toscane_lira_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_lira_toscane_lira_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_lira_toscane_lira
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_lira_toscane_lira
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:lira_toscane_liraet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_lira_toscane_lira_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_lira_toscane_lira_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:lira_toscane_liraet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_lira_toscane_lira_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_lira_toscane_lira_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

#in_gold - mark
buy_mark_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_mark > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_mark_state
		player.valid_mark_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_mark_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_mark > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_mark_state
		valid_mark_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
mark_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = market_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_mark_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_mark
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_mark
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_mark_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_mark
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_mark
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
mark_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = market_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_mark_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_mark
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_mark
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:market_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:market_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_mark_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_mark_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_mark_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_mark_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_mark_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_mark_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_mark_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_mark_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_mark_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_mark_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_mark
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_mark
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:market_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:market_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_mark_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_mark_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_mark_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_mark_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_mark_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_mark_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_mark_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_mark_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_mark_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - mark_finnish_markka
buy_mark_finnish_markka_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_mark_finnish_markka > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state
		player.valid_mark_finnish_markka_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_mark_finnish_markka_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_mark_finnish_markka > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state
		valid_mark_finnish_markka_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
mark_finnish_markka_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = mark_finnish_markkaet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_mark_finnish_markka_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_mark_finnish_markka
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_mark_finnish_markka
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_mark_finnish_markka_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_mark_finnish_markka
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_mark_finnish_markka
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
mark_finnish_markka_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = mark_finnish_markkaet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_mark_finnish_markka_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_mark_finnish_markka
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_mark_finnish_markka
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:mark_finnish_markkaet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:mark_finnish_markkaet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_mark_finnish_markka_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_mark_finnish_markka
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_mark_finnish_markka
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:mark_finnish_markkaet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:mark_finnish_markkaet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
