#in_gold - peso
buy_peso_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_peso_state
		player.valid_peso_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_peso_state
		valid_peso_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
peso_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = pesoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
peso_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = pesoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:pesoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:pesoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:pesoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:pesoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - peso_argentine_peso
buy_peso_argentine_peso_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso_argentine_peso > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state
		player.valid_peso_argentine_peso_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_argentine_peso_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso_argentine_peso > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state
		valid_peso_argentine_peso_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
peso_argentine_peso_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_argentine_pesoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_argentine_peso_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_argentine_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_argentine_peso
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_argentine_peso_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_argentine_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_argentine_peso
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
peso_argentine_peso_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_argentine_pesoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_argentine_peso_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_argentine_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_argentine_peso
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_argentine_pesoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_argentine_pesoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_argentine_peso_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_argentine_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_argentine_peso
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_argentine_pesoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_argentine_pesoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}

		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state

			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_bolivien_pesoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

				law_peso_bolivien_peso_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes

					name = gold_state_1

						multiply = money_value_peso_bolivien_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_bolivien_peso
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_bolivien_peso_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_bolivien_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_bolivien_peso
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
peso_bolivien_peso_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_bolivien_pesoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_bolivien_peso_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_bolivien_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_bolivien_peso
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_bolivien_pesoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_peso_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_peso_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_bolivien_pesoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_peso_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_peso_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_bolivien_peso_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_bolivien_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_bolivien_peso
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_bolivien_pesoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_peso_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_peso_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_bolivien_pesoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_peso_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_peso_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - peso_chilean_peso
buy_peso_chilean_peso_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso_chilean_peso > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state
		player.valid_peso_chilean_peso_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_chilean_peso_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso_chilean_peso > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state
		valid_peso_chilean_peso_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
peso_chilean_peso_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_chilean_pesoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_chilean_peso_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_chilean_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_chilean_peso
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_chilean_peso_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_chilean_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_chilean_peso
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
peso_chilean_peso_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_chilean_pesoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_chilean_peso_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_chilean_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_chilean_peso
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_chilean_pesoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_chilean_pesoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_chilean_peso_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_chilean_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_chilean_peso
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_chilean_pesoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_chilean_pesoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}

			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_colombian_pesoet_owner

				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place

					}
				}

					name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_colombian_peso
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state_1

					}
				}
			}
		}

					name = silver_state_1

						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_colombian_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_colombian_peso
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
peso_colombian_peso_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_colombian_pesoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_colombian_peso_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_colombian_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_colombian_peso
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_colombian_pesoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_colombian_peso_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_colombian_peso_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_colombian_pesoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_colombian_peso_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_colombian_peso_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_colombian_peso_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_colombian_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_colombian_peso
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_colombian_pesoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_colombian_peso_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_colombian_peso_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_colombian_pesoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_colombian_peso_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_colombian_peso_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - peso_costa_rican_colon
buy_peso_costa_rican_colon_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso_costa_rican_colon > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state
		player.valid_peso_costa_rican_colon_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_costa_rican_colon_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso_costa_rican_colon > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state
		valid_peso_costa_rican_colon_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
peso_costa_rican_colon_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_costa_rican_colonet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_costa_rican_colon_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_costa_rican_colon
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_costa_rican_colon
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_costa_rican_colon_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_costa_rican_colon
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_costa_rican_colon
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
peso_costa_rican_colon_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_costa_rican_colonet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_costa_rican_colon_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_costa_rican_colon
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_costa_rican_colon
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_costa_rican_colonet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_costa_rican_colonet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_costa_rican_colon_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_costa_rican_colon
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_costa_rican_colon
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_costa_rican_colonet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_costa_rican_colonet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso_cuban_peso > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state

		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}

	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso_cuban_peso > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state
		valid_peso_cuban_peso_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_peso_cuban_peso_currency

				has_law = law_type:law_peso_cuban_peso_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls

peso_cuban_peso_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_cuban_pesoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_cuban_peso_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_cuban_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_cuban_peso
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_cuban_peso_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_cuban_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_cuban_peso
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
peso_cuban_peso_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_cuban_pesoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_cuban_peso_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_cuban_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_cuban_peso
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_cuban_pesoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_cuban_peso_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_cuban_peso_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_cuban_pesoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_cuban_peso_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_cuban_peso_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_cuban_peso_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_cuban_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_cuban_peso
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_cuban_pesoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_cuban_peso_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_cuban_peso_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_cuban_pesoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_cuban_peso_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_cuban_peso_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - peso_ecuadorian_peso
buy_peso_ecuadorian_peso_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso_ecuadorian_peso > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state
		player.valid_peso_ecuadorian_peso_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_ecuadorian_peso_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso_ecuadorian_peso > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state
		valid_peso_ecuadorian_peso_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
peso_ecuadorian_peso_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_ecuadorian_pesoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_ecuadorian_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_ecuadorian_peso
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_ecuadorian_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_ecuadorian_peso
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
peso_ecuadorian_peso_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_ecuadorian_pesoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_ecuadorian_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_ecuadorian_peso
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_ecuadorian_pesoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_ecuadorian_pesoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_ecuadorian_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_ecuadorian_peso
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_ecuadorian_pesoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_ecuadorian_pesoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - peso_el_salvador_colon
buy_peso_el_salvador_colon_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso_el_salvador_colon > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_state
		player.valid_peso_el_salvador_colon_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}

	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso_el_salvador_colon > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_state
		valid_peso_el_salvador_colon_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_peso_el_salvador_colon_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_el_salvador_colon_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
