peso_el_salvador_colon_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_el_salvador_colonet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_el_salvador_colon_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_el_salvador_colon
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_el_salvador_colon
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_el_salvador_colon_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_el_salvador_colon
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_el_salvador_colon
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
peso_el_salvador_colon_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_el_salvador_colonet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_el_salvador_colon_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_el_salvador_colon
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_el_salvador_colon
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_el_salvador_colonet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_el_salvador_colon_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_el_salvador_colon_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_el_salvador_colonet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_el_salvador_colon_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_el_salvador_colon_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_el_salvador_colon_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_el_salvador_colon
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_el_salvador_colon
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_el_salvador_colonet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_el_salvador_colon_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_el_salvador_colon_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_el_salvador_colonet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_el_salvador_colon_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_el_salvador_colon_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - peso_guatemalan_quetzal
buy_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso_guatemalan_quetzal > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_state
		player.valid_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso_guatemalan_quetzal > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_state
		valid_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
peso_guatemalan_quetzal_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_guatemalan_quetzalet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_guatemalan_quetzal
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_guatemalan_quetzal
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_guatemalan_quetzal
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_guatemalan_quetzal
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
peso_guatemalan_quetzal_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_guatemalan_quetzalet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_guatemalan_quetzal
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_guatemalan_quetzal
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_guatemalan_quetzalet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_guatemalan_quetzalet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_guatemalan_quetzal
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_guatemalan_quetzal
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_guatemalan_quetzalet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_guatemalan_quetzalet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

#in_gold - peso_honduran_lempira
buy_peso_honduran_lempira_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso_honduran_lempira > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_state
		player.valid_peso_honduran_lempira_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_honduran_lempira_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso_honduran_lempira > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_state
		valid_peso_honduran_lempira_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_peso_honduran_lempira_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_honduran_lempira_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
peso_honduran_lempira_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_honduran_lempiraet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_honduran_lempira_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_honduran_lempira
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_honduran_lempira
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_honduran_lempira_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_honduran_lempira
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_honduran_lempira
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
peso_honduran_lempira_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_honduran_lempiraet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_honduran_lempira_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_honduran_lempira
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_honduran_lempira
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_honduran_lempiraet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_honduran_lempira_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_honduran_lempira_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_honduran_lempiraet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_honduran_lempira_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_honduran_lempira_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_honduran_lempira_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_honduran_lempira
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_honduran_lempira
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_honduran_lempiraet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_honduran_lempira_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_honduran_lempira_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_honduran_lempiraet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_honduran_lempira_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_honduran_lempira_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - peso_mexican_peso
buy_peso_mexican_peso_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso_mexican_peso > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state
		player.valid_peso_mexican_peso_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_mexican_peso_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso_mexican_peso > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state
		valid_peso_mexican_peso_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_peso_mexican_peso_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_mexican_peso_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
peso_mexican_peso_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_mexican_pesoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_mexican_peso_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_mexican_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_mexican_peso
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_mexican_peso_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_mexican_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_mexican_peso
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
peso_mexican_peso_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_mexican_pesoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_mexican_peso_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_mexican_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_mexican_peso
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_mexican_pesoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_mexican_peso_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_mexican_peso_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_mexican_pesoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_mexican_peso_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_mexican_peso_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_mexican_peso_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_mexican_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_mexican_peso
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_mexican_pesoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_mexican_peso_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_mexican_peso_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_mexican_pesoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_mexican_peso_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_mexican_peso_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - peso_nicaraguan_cordoba
buy_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state
		player.valid_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state
		valid_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_nicaraguan_cordobaet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_nicaraguan_cordobaet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_nicaraguan_cordobaet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_nicaraguan_cordobaet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_nicaraguan_cordobaet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_nicaraguan_cordobaet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - peso_paraguayan_peso
buy_peso_paraguayan_peso_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso_paraguayan_peso > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state
		player.valid_peso_paraguayan_peso_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_paraguayan_peso_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso_paraguayan_peso > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state
		valid_peso_paraguayan_peso_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_peso_paraguayan_peso_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_paraguayan_peso_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
peso_paraguayan_peso_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_paraguayan_pesoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_paraguayan_peso_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_paraguayan_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_paraguayan_peso
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_paraguayan_peso_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_paraguayan_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_paraguayan_peso
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
peso_paraguayan_peso_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_paraguayan_pesoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_paraguayan_peso_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_paraguayan_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_paraguayan_peso
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_paraguayan_pesoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_paraguayan_peso_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_paraguayan_peso_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_paraguayan_pesoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_paraguayan_peso_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_paraguayan_peso_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_paraguayan_peso_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_paraguayan_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_paraguayan_peso
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_paraguayan_pesoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_paraguayan_peso_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_paraguayan_peso_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_paraguayan_pesoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_paraguayan_peso_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_paraguayan_peso_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - peso_philippine_peso
buy_peso_philippine_peso_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso_philippine_peso > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state
		player.valid_peso_philippine_peso_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_philippine_peso_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso_philippine_peso > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state
		valid_peso_philippine_peso_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_peso_philippine_peso_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_philippine_peso_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
peso_philippine_peso_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_philippine_pesoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_philippine_peso_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_philippine_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_philippine_peso
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_philippine_peso_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_philippine_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_philippine_peso
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
peso_philippine_peso_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_philippine_pesoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_philippine_peso_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_philippine_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_philippine_peso
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_philippine_pesoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_philippine_peso_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_philippine_peso_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_philippine_pesoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_philippine_peso_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_philippine_peso_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_philippine_peso_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_philippine_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_philippine_peso
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_philippine_pesoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_philippine_peso_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_philippine_peso_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_philippine_pesoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_philippine_peso_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_philippine_peso_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}

		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_state

			}
