peso_sol_de_oro_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_sol_de_oroet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_sol_de_oro_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_sol_de_oro
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_sol_de_oro
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_sol_de_oro_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_sol_de_oro
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_sol_de_oro
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
peso_sol_de_oro_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_sol_de_oroet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_sol_de_oro_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_sol_de_oro
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_sol_de_oro
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_sol_de_oroet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_sol_de_oro_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_sol_de_oro_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_sol_de_oroet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_sol_de_oro_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_sol_de_oro_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_sol_de_oro_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_sol_de_oro
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_sol_de_oro
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_sol_de_oroet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_sol_de_oro_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_sol_de_oro_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_sol_de_oroet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_sol_de_oro_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_sol_de_oro_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - peso_uruguayan_peso
buy_peso_uruguayan_peso_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso_uruguayan_peso > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_state
		player.valid_peso_uruguayan_peso_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_peso_uruguayan_peso_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso_uruguayan_peso > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_state
		valid_peso_uruguayan_peso_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_peso_uruguayan_peso_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_uruguayan_peso_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
peso_uruguayan_peso_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_uruguayan_pesoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_uruguayan_peso_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_uruguayan_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_uruguayan_peso
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_uruguayan_peso_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_uruguayan_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_uruguayan_peso
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
peso_uruguayan_peso_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_uruguayan_pesoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_uruguayan_peso_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_uruguayan_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_uruguayan_peso
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_uruguayan_pesoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_uruguayan_peso_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_uruguayan_peso_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_uruguayan_pesoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_uruguayan_peso_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_uruguayan_peso_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_uruguayan_peso_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_uruguayan_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_uruguayan_peso
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_uruguayan_pesoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_uruguayan_peso_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_uruguayan_peso_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_uruguayan_pesoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_uruguayan_peso_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_uruguayan_peso_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - peso_venezuelan_peso

	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso_venezuelan_peso > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_state

		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}

	is_valid = {
		money_value_peso_venezuelan_peso > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_state
		valid_peso_venezuelan_peso_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_peso_venezuelan_peso_currency

				has_law = law_type:law_peso_venezuelan_peso_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}

		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_venezuelan_pesoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_venezuelan_peso_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_venezuelan_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_venezuelan_peso
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_venezuelan_peso_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_venezuelan_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_venezuelan_peso
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
peso_venezuelan_peso_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = peso_venezuelan_pesoet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_venezuelan_peso_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_venezuelan_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_venezuelan_peso
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_venezuelan_pesoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_venezuelan_peso_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_venezuelan_peso_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_venezuelan_pesoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_venezuelan_peso_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_venezuelan_peso_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_peso_venezuelan_peso_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_peso_venezuelan_peso
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_peso_venezuelan_peso
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:peso_venezuelan_pesoet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_venezuelan_peso_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_peso_venezuelan_peso_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:peso_venezuelan_pesoet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_peso_venezuelan_peso_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_peso_venezuelan_peso_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - pound_egyptian_pound
buy_pound_egyptian_pound_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_pound_egyptian_pound > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_state
		player.valid_pound_egyptian_pound_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_pound_egyptian_pound_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_pound_egyptian_pound > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_state
		valid_pound_egyptian_pound_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_pound_egyptian_pound_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_pound_egyptian_pound_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
pound_egyptian_pound_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = pound_egyptian_poundet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_pound_egyptian_pound_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_pound_egyptian_pound
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_pound_egyptian_pound
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_pound_egyptian_pound_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_pound_egyptian_pound
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_pound_egyptian_pound
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
pound_egyptian_pound_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = pound_egyptian_poundet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_pound_egyptian_pound_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_pound_egyptian_pound
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_pound_egyptian_pound
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:pound_egyptian_poundet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_pound_egyptian_pound_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_pound_egyptian_pound_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:pound_egyptian_poundet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_pound_egyptian_pound_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_pound_egyptian_pound_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_pound_egyptian_pound_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_pound_egyptian_pound
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_pound_egyptian_pound
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:pound_egyptian_poundet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_pound_egyptian_pound_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_pound_egyptian_pound_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:pound_egyptian_poundet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_pound_egyptian_pound_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_pound_egyptian_pound_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {

					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_pound_irish_pound
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
pound_irish_pound_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}

				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = pound_irish_poundet_owner

				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place

				}
			}
		}

			limit = {
				law_pound_irish_pound_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1

						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity

				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_state_1

						name = gold_state_1

							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_pound_irish_pound
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:pound_irish_poundet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_pound_irish_pound_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_pound_irish_pound_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:pound_irish_poundet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_pound_irish_pound_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_pound_irish_pound_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_pound_irish_pound_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_pound_irish_pound
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_pound_irish_pound
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:pound_irish_poundet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_pound_irish_pound_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_pound_irish_pound_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:pound_irish_poundet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_pound_irish_pound_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_pound_irish_pound_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - pound_sterling
buy_pound_sterling_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_pound_sterling > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_pound_sterling_state
		player.valid_pound_sterling_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_pound_sterling_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_pound_sterling > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_pound_sterling_state
		valid_pound_sterling_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
pound_sterling_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = pound_sterlinget_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_pound_sterling_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_pound_sterling
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_pound_sterling
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_pound_sterling_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_pound_sterling
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_pound_sterling
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
pound_sterling_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = pound_sterlinget_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_pound_sterling_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_pound_sterling
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_pound_sterling
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:pound_sterlinget_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:pound_sterlinget_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_pound_sterling_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_pound_sterling
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_pound_sterling
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:pound_sterlinget_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:pound_sterlinget_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_pound_sterling_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_pound_sterling_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

#in_gold - real
buy_real_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_real > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_real_state
		player.valid_real_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}

	is_valid = {
		money_value_real > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_real_state
		valid_real_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}

real_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = realet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_real_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_real
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_real
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_real_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_real_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity

					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_real
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_real_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
real_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = realet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_real_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_real
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_real
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:realet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_real_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:realet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_real_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_real_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_real_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_real_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_real_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_real_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_real_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_real_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_real_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_real_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_real_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_real_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_real_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_real
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_real
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:realet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_real_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:realet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_real_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_real_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_real_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_real_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_real_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_real_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_real_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_real_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_real_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_real_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_real_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_real_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - real_brazilian_real
buy_real_brazilian_real_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_real_brazilian_real > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_state
		player.valid_real_brazilian_real_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_real_brazilian_real_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_real_brazilian_real > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_state
		valid_real_brazilian_real_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_real_brazilian_real_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_real_brazilian_real_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
real_brazilian_real_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = real_brazilian_realet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_real_brazilian_real_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_real_brazilian_real
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_real_brazilian_real
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_real_brazilian_real_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_real_brazilian_real
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_real_brazilian_real
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
real_brazilian_real_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = real_brazilian_realet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_real_brazilian_real_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_real_brazilian_real
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_real_brazilian_real
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:real_brazilian_realet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_real_brazilian_real_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_real_brazilian_real_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:real_brazilian_realet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_real_brazilian_real_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_real_brazilian_real_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_real_brazilian_real_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_real_brazilian_real
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_real_brazilian_real
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:real_brazilian_realet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_real_brazilian_real_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_real_brazilian_real_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:real_brazilian_realet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_real_brazilian_real_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_real_brazilian_real_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_real_brazilian_real_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
