#in_gold - rupee_indian_rupee
buy_rupee_indian_rupee_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_rupee_indian_rupee > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state
		player.valid_rupee_indian_rupee_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_rupee_indian_rupee_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_rupee_indian_rupee > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state
		valid_rupee_indian_rupee_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indian_rupee_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indian_rupee_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
rupee_indian_rupee_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = rupee_indian_rupeeet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_rupee_indian_rupee_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_rupee_indian_rupee
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_rupee_indian_rupee
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_rupee_indian_rupee_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_rupee_indian_rupee
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_rupee_indian_rupee
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
rupee_indian_rupee_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = rupee_indian_rupeeet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_rupee_indian_rupee_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_rupee_indian_rupee
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_rupee_indian_rupee
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:rupee_indian_rupeeet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indian_rupee_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indian_rupee_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:rupee_indian_rupeeet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indian_rupee_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indian_rupee_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_rupee_indian_rupee_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_rupee_indian_rupee
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_rupee_indian_rupee
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:rupee_indian_rupeeet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indian_rupee_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indian_rupee_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:rupee_indian_rupeeet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indian_rupee_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indian_rupee_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_rupee_indian_rupee_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - rupee_indonesian_rupiah
buy_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_rupee_indonesian_rupiah > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state
		player.valid_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_rupee_indonesian_rupiah > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state
		valid_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
rupee_indonesian_rupiah_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = rupee_indonesian_rupiahet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_rupee_indonesian_rupiah
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_rupee_indonesian_rupiah
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_rupee_indonesian_rupiah
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_rupee_indonesian_rupiah
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
rupee_indonesian_rupiah_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = rupee_indonesian_rupiahet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_rupee_indonesian_rupiah
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_rupee_indonesian_rupiah
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:rupee_indonesian_rupiahet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:rupee_indonesian_rupiahet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_rupee_indonesian_rupiah
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_rupee_indonesian_rupiah
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:rupee_indonesian_rupiahet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:rupee_indonesian_rupiahet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_rupee_indonesian_rupiah_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

#in_gold - spe_baht
buy_spe_baht_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_spe_baht > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_spe_baht_state
		player.valid_spe_baht_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_baht_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_spe_baht > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_spe_baht_state
		valid_spe_baht_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_spe_baht_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_baht_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
spe_baht_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = spe_bahtet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_baht_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_baht
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_baht_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_baht
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_baht_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_baht_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_baht
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_baht_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_baht
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_baht_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_baht_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = spe_bahtet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_baht_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_baht
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_baht_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_baht
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:spe_bahtet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_baht_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_spe_baht_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_baht_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:spe_bahtet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_spe_baht_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_baht_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_baht_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_baht_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_baht_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_baht_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_spe_baht_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_baht_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_baht_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_baht_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_spe_baht_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_spe_baht_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_baht_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_baht_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_baht_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_baht
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_baht_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_baht
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:spe_bahtet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_baht_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_spe_baht_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_baht_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:spe_bahtet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_spe_baht_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_baht_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_baht_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_baht_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_baht_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_baht_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_spe_baht_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_baht_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_baht_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_baht_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_spe_baht_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_spe_baht_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_baht_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_baht_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - spe_dong
buy_spe_dong_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_spe_dong > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_spe_dong_state
		player.valid_spe_dong_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_dong_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_spe_dong > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_spe_dong_state
		valid_spe_dong_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_spe_dong_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_dong_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
spe_dong_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = spe_donget_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_dong_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_dong
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_dong_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_dong
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_dong_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_dong_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_dong
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_dong_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_dong
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_dong_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_dong_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = spe_donget_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_dong_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_dong
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_dong_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_dong
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:spe_donget_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_dong_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_spe_dong_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_dong_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:spe_donget_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_spe_dong_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_dong_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_dong_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_dong_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_dong_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_dong_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_spe_dong_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_dong_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_dong_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_dong_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_spe_dong_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_spe_dong_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_dong_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_dong_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_dong_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_dong
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_dong_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_dong
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:spe_donget_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_dong_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_spe_dong_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_dong_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:spe_donget_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_spe_dong_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_dong_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_dong_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_dong_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_dong_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_dong_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_spe_dong_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_dong_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_dong_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_dong_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_spe_dong_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_spe_dong_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_dong_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_dong_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

#in_gold - spe_drachma
buy_spe_drachma_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_spe_drachma > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_spe_drachma_state
		player.valid_spe_drachma_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_drachma_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_spe_drachma > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_spe_drachma_state
		valid_spe_drachma_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_spe_drachma_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_drachma_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
spe_drachma_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = spe_drachmaet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_drachma_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_drachma
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_drachma
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_drachma_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_drachma
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_drachma
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_drachma_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = spe_drachmaet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_drachma_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_drachma
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_drachma
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:spe_drachmaet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_drachma_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_spe_drachma_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:spe_drachmaet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_spe_drachma_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_drachma_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_spe_drachma_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_drachma_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_drachma
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_drachma
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:spe_drachmaet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_drachma_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_spe_drachma_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:spe_drachmaet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_spe_drachma_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_drachma_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_spe_drachma_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_drachma_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_drachma_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - spe_korean_won
buy_spe_korean_won_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_spe_korean_won > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state
		player.valid_spe_korean_won_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_korean_won_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_spe_korean_won > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state
		valid_spe_korean_won_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_spe_korean_won_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_korean_won_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
spe_korean_won_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = spe_korean_wonet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_korean_won_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_korean_won
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_korean_won
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_korean_won_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_korean_won
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_korean_won
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_korean_won_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = spe_korean_wonet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_korean_won_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_korean_won
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_korean_won
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:spe_korean_wonet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_korean_won_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_spe_korean_won_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:spe_korean_wonet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_spe_korean_won_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_korean_won_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_spe_korean_won_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_korean_won_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_korean_won
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_korean_won
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:spe_korean_wonet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_korean_won_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_spe_korean_won_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:spe_korean_wonet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_spe_korean_won_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_korean_won_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_spe_korean_won_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_korean_won_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_korean_won_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

		money_value_spe_latvian_lats > 0

		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}

			}

				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = spe_latvian_latset_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes

					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}

		}

						multiply = money_value_spe_latvian_lats
