				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_latvian_lats
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_latvian_lats_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = spe_latvian_latset_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_latvian_lats_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_latvian_lats
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_latvian_lats
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:spe_latvian_latset_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_latvian_lats_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_spe_latvian_lats_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:spe_latvian_latset_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_spe_latvian_lats_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_latvian_lats_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_latvian_lats_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_latvian_lats
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_latvian_lats
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:spe_latvian_latset_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_latvian_lats_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_spe_latvian_lats_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:spe_latvian_latset_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_spe_latvian_lats_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_latvian_lats_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - spe_lithuanian_litas
buy_spe_lithuanian_litas_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_spe_lithuanian_litas > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state
		player.valid_spe_lithuanian_litas_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_lithuanian_litas_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_spe_lithuanian_litas > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state
		valid_spe_lithuanian_litas_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_spe_lithuanian_litas_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_lithuanian_litas_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
spe_lithuanian_litas_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = spe_lithuanian_litaset_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_lithuanian_litas_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_lithuanian_litas
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_lithuanian_litas
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_lithuanian_litas_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_lithuanian_litas
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_lithuanian_litas
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_lithuanian_litas_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = spe_lithuanian_litaset_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_lithuanian_litas_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_lithuanian_litas
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_lithuanian_litas
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:spe_lithuanian_litaset_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_lithuanian_litas_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_spe_lithuanian_litas_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:spe_lithuanian_litaset_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_spe_lithuanian_litas_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_lithuanian_litas_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_lithuanian_litas_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_lithuanian_litas
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_lithuanian_litas
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:spe_lithuanian_litaset_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_lithuanian_litas_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_spe_lithuanian_litas_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:spe_lithuanian_litaset_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_spe_lithuanian_litas_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_lithuanian_litas_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - spe_peseta
buy_spe_peseta_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_spe_peseta > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_spe_peseta_state
		player.valid_spe_peseta_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_peseta_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_spe_peseta > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_spe_peseta_state
		valid_spe_peseta_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_spe_peseta_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_peseta_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
spe_peseta_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = spe_pesetaet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_peseta_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_peseta
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_peseta
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_peseta_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_peseta
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_peseta
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_peseta_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = spe_pesetaet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_peseta_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_peseta
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_peseta
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:spe_pesetaet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_peseta_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_spe_peseta_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:spe_pesetaet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_spe_peseta_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_peseta_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_spe_peseta_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_peseta_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_peseta
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_peseta
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:spe_pesetaet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_peseta_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_spe_peseta_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:spe_pesetaet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_spe_peseta_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_peseta_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_spe_peseta_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - spe_ruble
buy_spe_ruble_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_spe_ruble > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_spe_ruble_state
		player.valid_spe_ruble_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_ruble_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_spe_ruble > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_spe_ruble_state
		valid_spe_ruble_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_spe_ruble_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_ruble_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
spe_ruble_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = spe_rubleet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_ruble_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_ruble
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_ruble
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_ruble_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_ruble
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_ruble
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_ruble_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = spe_rubleet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_ruble_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_ruble
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_ruble
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:spe_rubleet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_ruble_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_spe_ruble_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:spe_rubleet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_spe_ruble_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_ruble_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_spe_ruble_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_ruble_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_ruble
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_ruble
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:spe_rubleet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_ruble_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_spe_ruble_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:spe_rubleet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_spe_ruble_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_ruble_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_spe_ruble_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls

spe_uni_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = spe_uniet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_uni_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_uni
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_uni_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_uni
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_uni_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_uni_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_uni
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_uni_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_uni
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_uni_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_uni_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = spe_uniet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_uni_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_uni
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_uni_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_uni
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:spe_uniet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_uni_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_spe_uni_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_uni_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:spe_uniet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_spe_uni_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_uni_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_uni_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_uni_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_uni_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_uni_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_spe_uni_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_uni_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_uni_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_uni_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_spe_uni_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_spe_uni_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_uni_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_uni_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_uni_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_uni
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_uni_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_uni
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:spe_uniet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_uni_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_spe_uni_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_uni_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:spe_uniet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_spe_uni_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_uni_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_uni_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_uni_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_uni_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_uni_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_spe_uni_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_uni_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_uni_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_uni_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_spe_uni_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_spe_uni_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_uni_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_uni_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - spe_yen
buy_spe_yen_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_spe_yen > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_spe_yen_state
		player.valid_spe_yen_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_yen_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_spe_yen > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_spe_yen_state
		valid_spe_yen_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_spe_yen_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_yen_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
spe_yen_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = spe_yenet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_yen_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_yen
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_yen_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_yen
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_yen_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_yen_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_yen
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_yen_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_yen
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_yen_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_yen_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = spe_yenet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_yen_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_yen
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_yen_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_yen
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:spe_yenet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_yen_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_spe_yen_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_yen_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:spe_yenet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_spe_yen_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_yen_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_yen_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_yen_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_yen_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_yen_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_spe_yen_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_yen_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_yen_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_yen_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_spe_yen_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_spe_yen_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_yen_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_yen_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_yen_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_yen
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_yen_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_yen
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:spe_yenet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_yen_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_spe_yen_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_yen_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:spe_yenet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_spe_yen_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_yen_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_yen_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_yen_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_yen_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_yen_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_spe_yen_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_yen_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_yen_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_yen_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_spe_yen_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_spe_yen_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_yen_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_yen_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls

			has_law = law_type:law_spe_yuan_currency

				has_law = law_type:law_spe_yuan_currency

				is_player = yes

					limit = {

						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_yuan
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_yuan_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_yuan
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_yuan
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_yuan_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = spe_yuanet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_yuan_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_yuan
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_yuan
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:spe_yuanet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_yuan_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_spe_yuan_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:spe_yuanet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_spe_yuan_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_yuan_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_spe_yuan_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_yuan_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_yuan
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_yuan
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:spe_yuanet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_yuan_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_spe_yuan_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:spe_yuanet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_spe_yuan_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_yuan_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_spe_yuan_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - spe_zloti
buy_spe_zloti_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_spe_zloti > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_spe_zloti_state
		player.valid_spe_zloti_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_spe_zloti_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_spe_zloti > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_spe_zloti_state
		valid_spe_zloti_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_spe_zloti_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_zloti_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
spe_zloti_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = spe_zlotiet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_zloti_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_zloti
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_zloti
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_zloti_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_zloti
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_zloti
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
spe_zloti_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = spe_zlotiet_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_zloti_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_zloti
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_zloti
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:spe_zlotiet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_zloti_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_spe_zloti_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:spe_zlotiet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_spe_zloti_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_zloti_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_spe_zloti_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_spe_zloti_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_spe_zloti
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_spe_zloti
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:spe_zlotiet_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_zloti_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_spe_zloti_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:spe_zlotiet_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_spe_zloti_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_spe_zloti_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_spe_zloti_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - thaler_hannoveraner_thaler
buy_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state

		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
