	is_valid = {
		money_value_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state
		valid_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = thaler_hannoveraner_thaleret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = thaler_hannoveraner_thaleret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:thaler_hannoveraner_thaleret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:thaler_hannoveraner_thaleret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:thaler_hannoveraner_thaleret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:thaler_hannoveraner_thaleret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}
############################################################################################################################################################

############################################################################################################################################################
#in_gold - thaler_prussian_thaler
buy_thaler_prussian_thaler_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_thaler_prussian_thaler > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state
		player.valid_thaler_prussian_thaler_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
sell_thaler_prussian_thaler_in_gold_market_panel_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		money_value_thaler_prussian_thaler > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state
		valid_thaler_prussian_thaler_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_thaler_prussian_thaler_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_thaler_prussian_thaler_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}
}
thaler_prussian_thaler_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = thaler_prussian_thaleret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_thaler_prussian_thaler_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_thaler_prussian_thaler
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_thaler_prussian_thaler
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_thaler_prussian_thaler_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_thaler_prussian_thaler
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_thaler_prussian_thaler
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
thaler_prussian_thaler_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = thaler_prussian_thaleret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_thaler_prussian_thaler_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_thaler_prussian_thaler
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_thaler_prussian_thaler
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:thaler_prussian_thaleret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_thaler_prussian_thaler_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_thaler_prussian_thaler_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:thaler_prussian_thaleret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_thaler_prussian_thaler_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_thaler_prussian_thaler_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_thaler_prussian_thaler_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_thaler_prussian_thaler
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_thaler_prussian_thaler
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:thaler_prussian_thaleret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_thaler_prussian_thaler_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_thaler_prussian_thaler_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:thaler_prussian_thaleret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_thaler_prussian_thaler_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_thaler_prussian_thaler_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

		money_value_thaler_saxon_thaler > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity  < stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state

		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}

	is_valid = {
		money_value_thaler_saxon_thaler > 0
		player.var:currency_quantity < player.stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state
		valid_thaler_saxon_thaler_metal_reserve_type > buy_sell_currency_in_metal_market_panel
		or  = {
			has_law = law_type:law_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency
			any_subject_or_below = {
				has_law = law_type:law_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency
			}
		}
		not = {
			has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		}
	}

thaler_saxon_thaler_buy_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = thaler_saxon_thaleret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_thaler_saxon_thaler_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_thaler_saxon_thaler
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_thaler_saxon_thaler
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_thaler_saxon_thaler_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					add = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_thaler_saxon_thaler
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						subtract = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_thaler_saxon_thaler
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
						add = owner.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
thaler_saxon_thaler_sell_in_gold = {
	effect = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}
		scope:player_country = {
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_player
				}
			}
		}
		root = {
			save_scope_as = thaler_saxon_thaleret_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_thaler_saxon_thaler_monetary_system_GS_BS_GES_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_thaler_saxon_thaler
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}

			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_thaler_saxon_thaler
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:thaler_saxon_thaleret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:thaler_saxon_thaleret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

		}
		#silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				law_thaler_saxon_thaler_monetary_system_SS_trigger = yes
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				#metal
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					subtract = {
						value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
						multiply = money_value_thaler_saxon_thaler
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
				}
			}
			scope:player_country = {
				scope:central_bank_site_player = {
					#metal
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = {
							value = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
							multiply = money_value_thaler_saxon_thaler
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						not = {
							scope:thaler_saxon_thaleret_owner = {
								or = {
									has_law = law_type:law_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency
									any_subject_or_below = {
										has_law = law_type:law_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:thaler_saxon_thaleret_owner = {
							or = {
								has_law = law_type:law_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency
								any_subject_or_below = {
									has_law = law_type:law_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency
								}
							}
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = var:currency_quantity
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
								subtract = var:currency_quantity
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_player.var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_player = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = yes
	}
}

#TODO
bond_in_currency_always_no = {
	is_valid = {
		always = yes
	}
}

bond_in_currency_on_v = {
	is_shown = {
		var:bond_in_on = 1
	}
}
bond_in_currency_off_v = {
	is_shown = {
		var:bond_in_on = 0
	}
}
bond_in_currency_on = {
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = bond_in_on
			value = 1
		}
	}
}
bond_in_currency_off = {
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = bond_in_on
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

choose_currency_type_dinar_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dinar = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_dinar_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dinar = 0
	}
}

#dinar_algerian_dinar
choose_currency_type_dinar_algerian_dinar = {
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_dinar
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_dinar_algerian_dinar
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_dinar_iraqi_dinar
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_dinar_libyan_dinar
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_dinar_moroccan_dirham

choose_currency_type_dinar_algerian_dinar_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dinar_algerian_dinar = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_dinar_algerian_dinar_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dinar_algerian_dinar = 0
	}
}

	is_shown = {

	}
}

	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dinar_libyan_dinar = 0
	}
}

	}
}

		var:choose_currency_type_dinar_saudi_riyal = 1
	}

	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dinar_saudi_riyal = 0
	}
}

choose_currency_type_dinar_tunisian_dinar_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dinar_tunisian_dinar = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_dinar_tunisian_dinar_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dinar_tunisian_dinar = 0
	}
}

choose_currency_type_dollar_australian_dollar_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dollar_australian_dollar = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_dollar_australian_dollar_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dollar_australian_dollar = 0
	}
}

#dollar_canadian_dollar

			name = choose_currency_type_dinar
			value = 0
		}

			name = choose_currency_type_dinar_algerian_dinar
			value = 0
		}

choose_currency_type_dollar_caribbean_dollar_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dollar_caribbean_dollar = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_dollar_caribbean_dollar_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dollar_caribbean_dollar = 0
	}
}

			value = 0

choose_currency_type_dollar_liberian_dollar_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dollar_liberian_dollar = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_dollar_liberian_dollar_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dollar_liberian_dollar = 0
	}
}

			name = choose_currency_type_dinar

choose_currency_type_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar = 0
	}
}

choose_currency_type_eco_ariary_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_eco_ariary = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_eco_ariary_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_eco_ariary = 0
	}
}

choose_currency_type_eco_east_african_eco_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_eco_east_african_eco = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_eco_east_african_eco_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_eco_east_african_eco = 0
	}
}

choose_currency_type_eco_ghanaian_pound_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_eco_ghanaian_pound = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_eco_ghanaian_pound_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_eco_ghanaian_pound = 0
	}
}

choose_currency_type_eco_south_african_rand_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_eco_south_african_rand = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_eco_south_african_rand_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_eco_south_african_rand = 0
	}
}

	}

choose_currency_type_franc_french_franc_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_franc_french_franc = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_franc_french_franc_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_franc_french_franc = 0
	}
}

choose_currency_type_franc_swiss_franc_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_franc_swiss_franc = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_franc_swiss_franc_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_franc_swiss_franc = 0
	}
}

	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_gulden_bavarian_gulden = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_gulden_bavarian_gulden_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_gulden_bavarian_gulden = 0
	}
}

	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_gulden_hungarian_forint = 1
	}

	is_shown = {

	}
}

	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_krone_slovak_koruna = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_krone_slovak_koruna_off = {
	is_shown = {

	}
}

	}
}
choose_currency_type_leon_leu_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_leon_leu = 0
	}
}

choose_currency_type_lira_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_lira = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_lira_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_lira = 0
	}
}

	}

	}
}

choose_currency_type_lira_scudo_sardo_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_lira_scudo_sardo = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_lira_scudo_sardo_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_lira_scudo_sardo = 0
	}
}

choose_currency_type_mark_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_mark = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_mark_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_mark = 0
	}
}

		}

		}
	}
}

choose_currency_type_peso_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_peso = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_peso_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_peso = 0
	}
}

			value = 0
		}

			value = 0

			name = choose_currency_type_spe_yen
			value = 0
		}

			value = 0

		var:choose_currency_type_peso_colombian_peso = 1
	}

	}

			value = 0

			name = choose_currency_type_spe_yen

			value = 0

			name = choose_currency_type_spe_lithuanian_litas

			name = choose_currency_type_spe_ruble

		}

			value = 0

			name = choose_currency_type_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler
			value = 0
		}

			name = choose_currency_type_thaler_prussian_thaler
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_thaler_saxon_thaler
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

	}

#real

	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_dinar
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {

choose_currency_type_real_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_real = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_real_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_real = 0
	}
}

		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_dinar
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_dinar_algerian_dinar
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_dinar_iraqi_dinar
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_dinar_libyan_dinar
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = choose_currency_type_dinar_moroccan_dirham
			value = 0

choose_currency_type_rupee_indian_rupee_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_rupee_indian_rupee = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_rupee_indian_rupee_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_rupee_indian_rupee = 0
	}
}

			name = choose_currency_type_dinar

		}

			name = choose_currency_type_dinar_omanian_rial
			value = 0
		}

			name = choose_currency_type_dinar_qiran
			value = 0
		}

			name = choose_currency_type_dinar_saudi_riyal

		var:choose_currency_type_spe_baht = 0
	}
}

choose_currency_type_spe_drachma_off = {

		var:choose_currency_type_spe_drachma = 0
	}
}

			name = choose_currency_type_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar

choose_currency_type_spe_peseta_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_spe_peseta = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_spe_peseta_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_spe_peseta = 0
	}
}

choose_currency_type_spe_uni_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_spe_uni = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_spe_uni_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_spe_uni = 0
	}
}

			name = choose_currency_type_franc_swiss_franc
			value = 0
		}

			name = choose_currency_type_thaler_saxon_thaler
			value = 1
		}
	}
}

choose_currency_type_thaler_saxon_thaler_on = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_thaler_saxon_thaler = 1
	}
}
choose_currency_type_thaler_saxon_thaler_off = {
	is_shown = {
		var:choose_currency_type_thaler_saxon_thaler = 0
	}
}

money_value_dinar_visible = {
	is_shown = {
		dinar_c_global_stokpile > 0
		not = {
			root = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
			}
		}
	}
}

money_value_thaler_saxon_thaler_visible = {

	effect = {

		set_global_variable = {
			name = currency_dropdown_option_0
			value = flag:option_0
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = currency_dropdown_option_25
			value = flag:option_25
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = currency_dropdown_option_50
			value = flag:option_50
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = currency_dropdown_option_75
			value = flag:option_75
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = currency_dropdown_option_100
			value = flag:option_100
		}




		add_to_global_variable_list = {
			name = dropdown_menu_currency
			target = global_var:currency_dropdown_option_0
		}
		add_to_global_variable_list = {
			name = dropdown_menu_currency
			target = global_var:currency_dropdown_option_25
		}
		add_to_global_variable_list = {
			name = dropdown_menu_currency
			target = global_var:currency_dropdown_option_50
		}
		add_to_global_variable_list = {
			name = dropdown_menu_currency
			target = global_var:currency_dropdown_option_75
		}
		add_to_global_variable_list = {
			name = dropdown_menu_currency
			target = global_var:currency_dropdown_option_100
		}
	}
}

update_currency_liste = {
	effect = {
		currency_law_list = yes
		money_value_global_var = yes
		median_currency_value = yes
		clear_global_variable_list = dropdown_menu_currency

		#dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = {
					has_modifier = dinar_leading_currency_type
					market_owner_is_root_univ_with_buiding = no
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = dropdown_menu_currency
				target = global_var:currency_dropdown_dinar_01
			}
		}
		#dinar_algerian_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = {
					has_modifier = dinar_algerian_dinar_leading_currency_type
					market_owner_is_root_univ_with_buiding = no
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = dropdown_menu_currency
				target = global_var:currency_dropdown_dinar_algerian_dinar_01
			}
		}
		#dinar_iraqi_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = {
					has_modifier = dinar_iraqi_dinar_leading_currency_type
					market_owner_is_root_univ_with_buiding = no
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = dropdown_menu_currency
				target = global_var:currency_dropdown_dinar_iraqi_dinar_01
			}
		}
		#dinar_libyan_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = {
					has_modifier = dinar_libyan_dinar_leading_currency_type
					market_owner_is_root_univ_with_buiding = no
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = dropdown_menu_currency
				target = global_var:currency_dropdown_dinar_libyan_dinar_01
			}
		}
		#dinar_moroccan_dirham
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = {
					has_modifier = dinar_moroccan_dirham_leading_currency_type
					market_owner_is_root_univ_with_buiding = no
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = dropdown_menu_currency
				target = global_var:currency_dropdown_dinar_moroccan_dirham_01
			}
		}
		#dinar_omanian_rial
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = {
					has_modifier = dinar_omanian_rial_leading_currency_type
					market_owner_is_root_univ_with_buiding = no
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = dropdown_menu_currency
				target = global_var:currency_dropdown_dinar_omanian_rial_01
			}
		}
		#dinar_qiran
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = {
					has_modifier = dinar_qiran_leading_currency_type
					market_owner_is_root_univ_with_buiding = no
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = dropdown_menu_currency
				target = global_var:currency_dropdown_dinar_qiran_01
			}
		}
		#dinar_saudi_riyal
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = {
					has_modifier = dinar_saudi_riyal_leading_currency_type
					market_owner_is_root_univ_with_buiding = no
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = dropdown_menu_currency
				target = global_var:currency_dropdown_dinar_saudi_riyal_01
			}
		}
		#dinar_serbian_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = {
					has_modifier = dinar_serbian_dinar_leading_currency_type
					market_owner_is_root_univ_with_buiding = no
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = dropdown_menu_currency
				target = global_var:currency_dropdown_dinar_serbian_dinar_01
			}
		}
		#dinar_tunisian_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_country = {
					has_modifier = dinar_tunisian_dinar_leading_currency_type
					market_owner_is_root_univ_with_buiding = no
				}
			}

selection_changed_for_currency = {
	scope = country

	saved_scopes = { currency_dropdown_option }

	effect = {
	    switch = {
			trigger = scope:currency_dropdown_option
			flag:dinar_01 = {
				set_variable = {
					name = currency_selection
					value = flag:dinar_01
				}
				choose_currency_type_reset_all = yes
				set_variable = {
					name = choose_currency_type_dinar
					value = 1
				}
			}
			flag:dinar_algerian_dinar_01 = {
				set_variable = {
					name = currency_selection
					value = flag:dinar_algerian_dinar_01
				}
				choose_currency_type_reset_all = yes
				set_variable = {
					name = choose_currency_type_dinar_algerian_dinar
					value = 1
				}
			}
			flag:dinar_iraqi_dinar_01 = {
				set_variable = {
					name = currency_selection
					value = flag:dinar_iraqi_dinar_01
				}
				choose_currency_type_reset_all = yes
				set_variable = {
					name = choose_currency_type_dinar_iraqi_dinar
					value = 1
				}
			}
			flag:dinar_libyan_dinar_01 = {
				set_variable = {
					name = currency_selection
					value = flag:dinar_libyan_dinar_01
				}
				choose_currency_type_reset_all = yes
				set_variable = {
					name = choose_currency_type_dinar_libyan_dinar
					value = 1
				}
			}
			flag:dinar_moroccan_dirham_01 = {

}

update_currency_stored_liste = {
	effect = {
		clear_global_variable_list = stored_currency

		#dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					stockpiling_dinar_state > 0
					stockpiling_dinar_state < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = stored_currency
				target = global_var:currency_stored_dinar_02
			}
		}
		#dinar_algerian_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state > 0
					stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = stored_currency
				target = global_var:currency_stored_dinar_algerian_dinar_02
			}
		}
		#dinar_iraqi_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state > 0
					stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state < 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = stored_currency

update_financial_product_list = {
	effect = {
		clear_global_variable_list = financial_product_list

		#bond
		if = {
			limit = {
				stockpiling_bond_var_state > 0
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = financial_product_list
				target = global_var:financial_product_dropdown_bond_01
			}
		}
		#manufacture_stock
		if = {
			limit = {
				stockpiling_manufacture_stock_var_state > 0
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = financial_product_list
				target = global_var:financial_product_dropdown_manufacture_stock_01
			}
		}
		#agricultural_stock
		if = {
			limit = {
				stockpiling_agricultural_stock_var_state > 0
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = financial_product_list
				target = global_var:financial_product_dropdown_agricultural_stock_01
			}
		}
		#mining_stock
		if = {
			limit = {
				stockpiling_mining_stock_var_state > 0
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = financial_product_list
				target = global_var:financial_product_dropdown_mining_stock_01
			}
		}
		#railroad_stock
		if = {
			limit = {
				stockpiling_railroad_stock_var_state > 0
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = financial_product_list
				target = global_var:financial_product_dropdown_railroad_stock_01
			}
		}
	}
}

update_import_export_value_in_currency_liste = {
	effect = {
		clear_global_variable_list = import_export_value_in_currency

        #gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					import_from_gold > 0
					export_to_gold > 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = import_export_value_in_currency
				target = global_var:currency_import_export_value_gold_03
			}
		}
        #dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					import_from_dinar > 0
					export_to_dinar > 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = import_export_value_in_currency
				target = global_var:currency_import_export_value_dinar_03
			}
		}
        #dinar_algerian_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					import_from_dinar_algerian_dinar > 0
					export_to_dinar_algerian_dinar > 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = import_export_value_in_currency
				target = global_var:currency_import_export_value_dinar_algerian_dinar_03
			}
		}
        #dinar_iraqi_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					import_from_dinar_iraqi_dinar > 0
					export_to_dinar_iraqi_dinar > 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = import_export_value_in_currency
				target = global_var:currency_import_export_value_dinar_iraqi_dinar_03
			}
		}
        #dinar_libyan_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					import_from_dinar_libyan_dinar > 0
					export_to_dinar_libyan_dinar > 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = import_export_value_in_currency
				target = global_var:currency_import_export_value_dinar_libyan_dinar_03
			}
		}
        #dinar_moroccan_dirham
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					import_from_dinar_moroccan_dirham > 0
					export_to_dinar_moroccan_dirham > 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = import_export_value_in_currency
				target = global_var:currency_import_export_value_dinar_moroccan_dirham_03
			}
		}
        #dinar_omanian_rial
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					import_from_dinar_omanian_rial > 0
					export_to_dinar_omanian_rial > 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = import_export_value_in_currency
				target = global_var:currency_import_export_value_dinar_omanian_rial_03
			}
		}
        #dinar_qiran
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					import_from_dinar_qiran > 0
					export_to_dinar_qiran > 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = import_export_value_in_currency
				target = global_var:currency_import_export_value_dinar_qiran_03
			}
		}
        #dinar_saudi_riyal
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					import_from_dinar_saudi_riyal > 0
					export_to_dinar_saudi_riyal > 0

			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = import_export_value_in_currency
				target = global_var:currency_import_export_value_dinar_saudi_riyal_03
			}
		}
        #dinar_serbian_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					import_from_dinar_serbian_dinar > 0
					export_to_dinar_serbian_dinar > 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = import_export_value_in_currency

			}
		}
        #dinar_tunisian_dinar

				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = import_export_value_in_currency
				target = global_var:currency_import_export_value_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_03
			}
		}
        #dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					import_from_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar > 0
					export_to_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar > 0
				}
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = import_export_value_in_currency
				target = global_var:currency_import_export_value_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_03
			}
		}

update_import_export_value_in_currency_in_reeserve_liste = {
	effect = {
		clear_global_variable_list = import_export_value_in_currency_in_reeserve

		#gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:excess_in_gold_sc > 0
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = import_export_value_in_currency_in_reeserve
				target = global_var:currency_import_export_value_gold_03
			}
		}
		#dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency > 0
			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = import_export_value_in_currency_in_reeserve
				target = global_var:currency_import_export_value_dinar_03
			}
		}
		#dinar_algerian_dinar

			}
			add_to_global_variable_list = {
				name = import_export_value_in_currency_in_reeserve
				target = global_var:currency_import_export_value_dinar_algerian_dinar_03
			}
		}
		#dinar_iraqi_dinar

#    ██║   ██████╔╝███████║██╔██╗ ██║███████╗█████╗  █████╗  ██████╔╝        ██║  ███╗██║   ██║██║     ██║  ██║        ██║   ██║   ██║        ██║

################################################################################################
################################################################################################
################################################################################################
################################################################################################


transfer_gold_to_central_bank_metal_reserves_increase = {
	is_shown = {
	}

	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = transfer_gold_to_central_bank_metal_reserves
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = transfer_gold_to_central_bank_metal_reserves
				add = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}
transfer_gold_to_central_bank_metal_reserves_reduce = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	is_valid = {
		var:transfer_gold_to_central_bank_metal_reserves > 10000000
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = transfer_gold_to_central_bank_metal_reserves
				var:transfer_gold_to_central_bank_metal_reserves > 10000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = transfer_gold_to_central_bank_metal_reserves
				subtract = 10000000
			}
		}
	}
}

################################

################################

transfer_gold_to_central_bank_metal_reserves = {
	effect = {
		add_treasury = {
			value = 0
			subtract = var:transfer_gold_to_central_bank_metal_reserves
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					has_law = law_type:law_silver_standard
					has_law = law_type:law_bimetallism_standard
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = silver_state_1
						add = root.transfer_gold_to_central_bank_metal_reserves_sc
					}

				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gold_standard
					has_law = law_type:law_gold_exchange_standard
				}
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = gold_state_1
						add = root.transfer_gold_to_central_bank_metal_reserves_sc
					}

				}
			}
		}


	}
}

################################

################################

transfer_gold_to_central_bank_metal_reserves_visible = {
	is_valid = {
		gold_reserves_var > var:transfer_gold_to_central_bank_metal_reserves
	}
}
